S04bsu036_u:224: etādṛśo artha ayaṃ bhaviṣyati yenaiṣa raśmī vipulā pramuktā //
S04bsu036_u:225: Saddhp_1.54 ye agradharmā sugatena spṛṣṭāstada bodhimaṇḍe puruṣottamena /
S04bsu036_u:226: kiṃ teha nirdekṣyati lokanātho atha vyākariṣyatyayu bodhisattvān //
S04bsu036_u:227: Saddhp_1.55 analpakaṃ kāraṇametta bheṣyati yaddarśitāḥ kṣetrasahasra neke /
S04bsu036_u:229: Saddhp_1.56 pṛccheti maitreyu jinasya putra spṛhenti te naramaruyakṣarākṣasāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:230: catvārimā parṣa udīkṣamāṇā mañjusvaraḥ kiṃ nviha vyākariṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:231_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:232_1: ca mahādharmolkāsaṃprajvālanaṃ ca mahādharmaśaṅkhābhiprapūraṇaṃ ca mahādharmabherīparāhaṇanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:232_2: ca mahādharmanirdeśaṃ ca adya kulaputrāstathāgatasya kartumabhiprāyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:234: yathā ca mayā pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmidamevaṃrūpaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭamabhūt,
S04bsu036_u:236: tenaivaṃ prajānāmi - mahādharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyaṃ tathāgataḥ kartukāmo mahādharmaśravaṇaṃ śrāvayitukāmaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:241_1: parataraṃ yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena candrasūryapradīpo nāma [Vaidya_12]
S04bsu036_u:241_2: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu036_u:241_3: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:242: sa dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:243: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:244_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
S04bsu036_u:245: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma //
S04bsu036_u:246_0: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S04bsu036_u:246_1: pareṇa parataraṃ candrasūryapradīpa eva nāmnā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi /
S04bsu036_u:247_0: iti hi ajita etena paraṃparodāhāreṇa candrasūryapradīpanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
S04bsu036_u:248: tatra ajita teṣāṃ viṃśatitathāgatasahasrāṇāṃ pūrvakaṃ tathāgatamupādāya yāvat paścimakastathāgataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:249_0: so 'pi candrasūryapradīpanāmadheya eva tathāgato 'bhūdarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu036_u:249_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:250: so 'pi dharmaṃ deśitavān ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:251: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:252_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃyuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśitavān
S04bsu036_u:253: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharma deśitavān //
S04bsu036_u:254: tasya khalu punarajita bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvaṃ kumārabhūtasyānabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsasya aṣṭau putrā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:263: teṣāṃ khalu punarajita aṣṭānāṃ rājakumārāṇāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyaputrāṇāṃ vipularddhirabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:266: te taṃ bhagavantamabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsaṃ viditvā anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ śrutvā sarvarājyaparibhogānutsṛjya taṃ bhagavantamanu pravrajitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:268: sadā ca brahmacāriṇo bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāśca te rājakumārā abhuvan //
S04bsu036_u:269_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S04bsu036_u:269_1: mahānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ
S04bsu036_u:269_2: bhāṣitvā [Vaidya_13] tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte tasminneva parṣatsaṃnipāte tasminneva
S04bsu036_u:269_3: mahādharmāsane paryaṅkamābhujya anantanirdeśapratiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno
S04bsu036_u:270: samanantarasamāpannasya khalu punastasya bhagavato māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ mahatpuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /
S04bsu036_u:272: sarvāvacca tad buddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitamabhūt calitaṃ saṃpracalitaṃ vedhitaṃ saṃpravedhitaṃ kṣubhitaṃ saṃprakṣubhitam /
S04bsu036_u:273_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena tena kālena ye tasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā
S04bsu036_u:275: te sarve saparivārāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayanti sma āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:276: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasya bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośādekā raśmirniścaritā /
S04bsu036_u:278: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sarvāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu036_u:279: tadyathāpi nāma ajita etarhyetāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante //
S04bsu036_u:280: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavato viṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ samanubaddhā abhuvan /
S04bsu036_u:282: te āścaryaprāptā abhūvan adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ kautūhalasamutpannā etena mahāraśmyavabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā //
S04bsu036_u:283: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:285: sa ca bhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya taṃ varaprabhaṃ bodhisattvamārabhya saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:286: yāvat paripūrṇān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpān bhāṣitavān ekāsane niṣaṇṇo 'saṃpravedhamānena kāyena aniñjamānena cittena /
S04bsu036_u:287: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadekāsane niṣaṇṇā tān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpāṃstasya bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sma /
S04bsu036_u:288: na ca tasyāṃ parṣadi ekasattvasyāpi kāyaklamatho 'bhūt, na ca cittaklamathaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:289_1: taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ
S04bsu036_u:289_3: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:289_4: purastāt - adya bhikṣavo 'syāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme tathāgato 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti //
S04bsu036_u:290_0: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śrīgarbhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:290_1: nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtya tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ
S04bsu036_u:290_2: parṣadamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrīgarbho bodhisattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ
S04bsu036_u:293: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:294: taṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān /
S04bsu036_u:295: aśītiṃ cāntarakalpāṃstasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:296: tatra ajita ye tasya bhagavato 'ṣṭau putrā abhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:300: taiśca tataḥ paścādbahūni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭāni satkṛtāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:303: teṣāṃ ca aṣṭānāmantevāsiśatānāmeko bodhisattvo 'dhimātraṃ lābhaguruko 'bhūt satkāraguruko jñātaguruko yaśaskāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:307: ārāgayitvā ca satkṛtāni gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitānyarcitānyapacāyitāni /
S04bsu036_u:308: syātkhalu punaste ajita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:311: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:313: tvameva ajita sa tena kālena tena samayena yaśaskāmo nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt kausīdyaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:314: iti hi ajita ahamanena paryāyeṇedaṃ bhagavataḥ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃrūpāṃ raśmimutsṛṣṭāmevaṃ parimīmāṃse,
S04bsu036_u:315: yathā bhagavānapi taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitukāmaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:316: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta etamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:318: yadā jino āsi prajāna uttamaścandrasya sūryasya pradīpa nāma //
S04bsu036_u:319: Saddhp_1.58 saddharma deśeti prajāna nāyako vineti sattvāna anantakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:321: Saddhp_1.59 ye cāṣṭa putrāstada tasya āsan kumārabhūtasya vināyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:322: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pravrajitaṃ mahāmuniṃ jahitva kāmāṃllaghu sarvi prāvrajan //
S04bsu036_u:323: Saddhp_1.60 dharmaṃ ca so bhāṣati lokanātho anantanirdeśavaraṃ ti sūtram /
S04bsu036_u:325: Saddhp_1.61 samanantaraṃ bhāṣiya so vināyakaḥ paryaṅka bandhitva kṣaṇasmi tasmin /
S04bsu036_u:327: Saddhp_1.62 divyaṃ ca māndāravavarṣamāsīdaghaṭṭitā dundubhayaśca neduḥ /
S04bsu036_u:328: devāśca yakṣāśca sthitāntarīkṣe kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamasya //
S04bsu036_u:329: Saddhp_1.63 sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pracacāla tatkṣaṇam āścaryamatyadbhutamāsi tatra /
S04bsu036_u:330: raśmiṃ ca ekāṃ pramumoca nāyako bhruvāntarāttāmatidarśanīyām //
S04bsu036_u:331: Saddhp_1.64 pūrvāṃ ca gatvā diśa sā hi raśmiraṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇā /
S04bsu036_u:332: prabhāsayaṃ bhrājati sarvalokaṃ darśeti sattvāna cyutopapādam //
S04bsu036_u:333: Saddhp_1.65 ratnāmayā kṣetra tathātra kecidvaiḍūryanirbhāsa tathaiva kecit /
S04bsu036_u:335: devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
S04bsu036_u:336: Saddhp_1.66 devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
S04bsu036_u:338: ye cābhiyuktāḥ sugatasya pūjayā dṛśyanti pūjenti ca lokadhātuṣu //
S04bsu036_u:339: Saddhp_1.67 buddhāśca dṛśyanti svayaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ suvarṇayūpā iva darśanīyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:340: vaiḍūryamadhye ca suvarṇabimbaṃ parṣāya madhye pravadanti dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:341: Saddhp_1.68 tahi śrāvakāṇāṃ gaṇanā na vidyate te cāpramāṇāḥ sugatasya śrāvakāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:342: ekaikakṣetrasmi vināyakānāṃ raśmiprabhā darśayate hi sarvān //
S04bsu036_u:344: dṛśyanti putrā naranāyakānāṃ viharanti ye parvatakandareṣu //
S04bsu036_u:345: Saddhp_1.70 sarvasvadānāni parityajantaḥ kṣāntībalā dhyānaratāśca dhīrāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:346: bahubodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ sarve 'pi dṛśyanti tayā hi raśmyā //
S04bsu036_u:347: Saddhp_1.71 aniñjamānāśca avedhamānāḥ kṣāntau sthitā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:348: dṛśyanti putrāḥ sugatasya aurasā dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:349: Saddhp_1.72 bhūtaṃ padaṃ śāntamanāsravaṃ ca prajānamānāśca prakāśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:351: Saddhp_1.73 dṛṣṭvā ca tā parṣa catasra tāyinaścandrārkadīpasya imaṃ prabhāvam /
S04bsu036_u:352: harṣasthitāḥ sarvi bhavitva tatkṣaṇamanyonya pṛcchanti kathaṃ nu etat //
S04bsu036_u:353: Saddhp_1.74 acirācca so naramaruyakṣapūjitaḥ samādhito vyutthita lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:354: varaprabhaṃ putra tadādhyabhāṣata yo bodhisattvo vidu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:355: Saddhp_1.75 lokasya cakṣuśca gatiśca tvaṃ vidurvaiśvāsiko dharmadharaśca mahyam /
S04bsu036_u:356: tvaṃ hyatra sākṣī mama dharmakośe yathāhu bhāṣiṣyi hitāya prāṇinām //
S04bsu036_u:357: Saddhp_1.76 saṃsthāpayitvā bahubodhisattvān harṣitva saṃvarṇiya saṃstavitvā /
S04bsu036_u:358: prabhāṣate tajjina agradharmān paripūrṇa so antarakalpa ṣaṣṭim //
S04bsu036_u:359: Saddhp_1.77 yaṃ caiva so bhāṣati lokanātho ekāsanasthaḥ pravarāgradharmam /
S04bsu036_u:360: taṃ sarvamādhārayi so jinātmajo varaprabho yo abhu dharmabhāṇakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:361: Saddhp_1.78 so co jino bhāṣiya agradharmaṃ praharṣayitvā janatāmanekām /
S04bsu036_u:362: tasmiṃśca divase vadate sa nāyakaḥ purato hi lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:363: Saddhp_1.79 prakāśitā me iya dharmanetrī ācakṣito dharmasvabhāva yādṛaśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:364: nirvāṇakālo mama adya bhikṣavo rātrīya yāmasmiha madhyamasmin //
S04bsu036_u:365: Saddhp_1.80 bhavathāpramattā adhimuktisārā abhiyujyathā mahya imasmi śāsane /
S04bsu036_u:366: sudurlabhā bhonti jinā maharṣayaḥ kalpāna koṭīnayutāna atyayāt //
S04bsu036_u:368: Saddhp_1.81 saṃtāpajātā bahubuddhaputrā duḥkhena cogreṇa samarpitābhavan /
S04bsu036_u:371: Saddhp_1.82 āśvāsayitvā ca narendrarājā tāḥ prāṇakoṭyo bahavo acintiyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:372: mā bhāyathā bhikṣava nirvṛte mayi bhaviṣyatha buddha mamottareṇa //
S04bsu036_u:373: Saddhp_1.83 śrīgarbha eṣo vidu bodhisattvo gatiṃ gato jñāni anāsravasmin /
S04bsu036_u:374: spṛśiṣyate uttamamagrabodhiṃ vimalāgranetro ti jino bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:375: Saddhp_1.84 tāmeva rātriṃ tada yāmi madhyame parinirvṛto hetukṣaye va dīpaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:376: śarīra vaistāriku tasya cābhūt stūpāna koṭīnayutā anantakā //
S04bsu036_u:377: Saddhp_1.85 bhikṣuśca tatrā tatha bhikṣuṇīyo ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:378: analpakāste yatha gaṅgabālikā abhiyukta tasyo sugatasya śāsane //
S04bsu036_u:379: Saddhp_1.86 yaścāpi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇako varaprabho yena sa dharma dhāritaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:380: aśīti so antarakalpa pūrṇāṃ tahi śāsane bhāṣati agradharmān //
S04bsu036_u:381: Saddhp_1.87 aṣṭāśataṃ tasya abhūṣi śiṣyāḥ paripācitā ye tada tena sarve /
S04bsu036_u:382: dṛṣṭā ca tebhirbahubuddhakoṭyaḥ satkāru teṣāṃ ca kṛto maharṣiṇām //
S04bsu036_u:383: Saddhp_1.88 caryāṃ caritvā tada ānulomikīṃ buddhā abhūvan bahulokadhātuṣu
S04bsu036_u:384: parasparaṃ te ca anantareṇa anyonya vyākarṣu tadāgrabodhaye //
S04bsu036_u:385: Saddhp_1.89 teṣāṃ ca buddhāna paraṃpareṇa dīpaṃkaraḥ paścimako abhūṣi /
S04bsu036_u:387: Saddhp_1.90 yaścāsi tasyo sugatātmajasya varaprabhasyo tada dharma bhāṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:388: śiṣyaḥ kusīdaśca sa lolupātmā lābhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:389: Saddhp_1.91 yaśorthikaścāpyatimātra āsīt kulākulaṃ ca pratipannamāsīt /
S04bsu036_u:390: uddeśa svādhyāyu tathāsya sarvo na tiṣṭhate bhāṣitu tasmi kāle //
S04bsu036_u:391: Saddhp_1.92 nāmaṃ ca tasyo imamevamāsīd yaśakāmanāmnā diśatāsu viśrutaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:393: Saddhp_1.93 ārāgayī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ pūjāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāmakārṣīt /

S04bsu036_u:397: Saddhp_1.95 kausīdyaprāptastada yo babhūva parinirvṛtasya sugatasya śāsane /

S04bsu036_u:399: Saddhp_1.96 imena haṃ kāraṇahetunādya dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ idamevarūpam /

S04bsu036_u:403: Saddhp_1.98 tadeva paripūrṇa nimittamadya upāyakauśalya vināyakānām /

S04bsu036_u:424: alaṃ śāriputra etāvadeva bhāṣituṃ bhavatu - paramāścaryaprāptāḥ śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /

S04bsu036_u:435: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:438: Saddhp_2.2 balā vimokṣā ye teṣāṃ vaiśāradyāśca yādṛśāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:439: yādṛśā buddhadharmāśca na śakyaṃ jñātu kenacit //
S04bsu036_u:440: Saddhp_2.3 pūrve niṣevitā caryā buddhakoṭīna antike /
S04bsu036_u:441: gambhīrā caiva sūkṣmā ca durvijñeyā sudurdṛśā //
S04bsu036_u:442: Saddhp_2.4 tasyāṃ cīrṇāya caryāyāṃ kalpakoṭyo acintiyā /
S04bsu036_u:443: phalaṃ me bodhimaṇḍasmin dṛṣṭaṃ yādṛśakaṃ hi tat //
S04bsu036_u:444: Saddhp_2.5 ahaṃ ca tatprajānāmi ye cānye lokanāyakāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:445: yathā yad yādṛśaṃ cāpi lakṣaṇaṃ cāsya yādṛśam //
S04bsu036_u:446: Saddhp_2.6 na taddarśayituṃ śakyaṃ vyāhāro 'sya na vidyate /
S04bsu036_u:447: nāpyasau tādṛśaḥ kaścit sattvo lokasmi vidyate //
S04bsu036_u:448: Saddhp_2.7 yasya taṃ deśayeddharma deśitaṃ cāpi jāniyāt /
S04bsu036_u:450: Saddhp_2.8 ye cāpi te lokavidusya śrāvakāḥ kṛtādhikārāḥ sugatānuvarṇitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:451: kṣīṇāsravā antimadehadhāriṇo na teṣa viṣayo 'sti jināna jñāne //
S04bsu036_u:452: Saddhp_2.9 sa caiva sarvā iya lokadhātu pūrṇā bhavecchārisutopamānām /
S04bsu036_u:453: ekībhavitvāna vicintayeyuḥ sugatasya jñānaṃ na hi śakya jānitum //
S04bsu036_u:454: Saddhp_2.10 saceha tvaṃ sādṛśakehi paṇḍitaiḥ pūrṇā bhaveyurdaśā pi ddiśāyo /
S04bsu036_u:455: ye cāpi mahyaṃ imi śrāvakānye teṣāṃ pi pūrṇā bhavi evameva //
S04bsu036_u:456: Saddhp_2.11 ekībhavitvāna ca te 'dya sarve vicintayeyuḥ sugatasya jñānam /

S04bsu036_u:459: diśo daśaḥ sarva bhaveyuḥ pūrṇā yathā naḍānāṃ vanaveṇunāṃ vā //
S04bsu036_u:461: kalpāna koṭīnayutānanantānna tasya bhūtaṃ parijāni artham //
S04bsu036_u:465: suviniścitārthā bahudharmabhāṇakāsteṣāṃ pi pūrṇā daśimā diśo bhavet //
S04bsu036_u:466: Saddhp_2.15 naḍāna veṇūna va nityakālamacchidrapūrṇo bhavi sarvalokaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:467: ekībhavitvāna vicintayeyuryo dharma sākṣāt sugatena dṛṣṭaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:468: Saddhp_2.16 anucintayitvā bahukalpakoṭyo gaṅgā yathā vālika aprameyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:469: ananyacittāḥ sukhumāya prajñayā teṣāṃ pi cāsmin viṣayo na vidyate //
S04bsu036_u:470: Saddhp_2.17 avivartikā ye bhavi bodhisattvā analpakā yathariva gaṅgavālikāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:471: ananyacittāśca vicintayeyusteṣāṃ pi cāsmin viṣayo na vidyate //
S04bsu036_u:472: Saddhp_2.18 gambhīra dharmā sukhumā pi buddhā atarkikāḥ sarvi anāsravāśca /
S04bsu036_u:473: ahaṃ ca jānāmiha yādṛśā hi te te vā jinā loki daśaddiśāsu //
S04bsu036_u:474: Saddhp_2.19 yaṃ śāriputro sugataḥ prabhāṣate adhimuktisaṃpanna bhavāhi tatra /
S04bsu036_u:475: ananyathāvādi jino maharṣī cireṇa pī bhāṣati uttamārtham //
S04bsu036_u:476: Saddhp_2.20 āmantrayāmī imi sarvaśrāvakān pratyekabodhāya ca ye 'bhiprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:477: saṃsthāpitā ye maya nirvṛtīya saṃmokṣitā duḥkhaparaṃparātaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:478: Saddhp_2.21 upāyakauśalya mametadagraṃ bhāṣāmi dharmaṃ bahu yena loke /
S04bsu036_u:479: tahiṃ tahiṃ lagna pramocayāmi trīṇī ca yānānyupadarśayāmi //
S04bsu036_u:481_0: atha khalu ye tatra parṣatsaṃnipāte mahāśrāvakā ājñātakauṇḍinyapramukhā arhantaḥ
S04bsu036_u:481_1: kṣīṇāsravā dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni ye cānye śrāvakayānikā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā
S04bsu036_u:482: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmetadabhavat - ko nu hetuḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yad bhagavānadhimātramupāyakauśalyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ saṃvarṇayati?
S04bsu036_u:485: yathā tāvad bhagavatā ekaiva vimuktirākhyātā, vayamapi buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhino nirvāṇaprāptāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:486: asya ca vayaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtha na jānīmaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:487_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vicikitsākathaṃkathāṃ viditvā
S04bsu036_u:487_1: cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya ātmanā ca dharmasaṃśayaprāptastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:488: kaḥ pratyayo yad bhagavānadhimātraṃ punaḥ punastathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyajñānadarśanadharmadeśanāṃ saṃvarṇayati - gambhīraśca me dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti /
S04bsu036_u:489: durvijñeyaṃ ca saṃghābhāṣyamiti punaḥ punaḥ saṃvarṇayati /
S04bsu036_u:490: na ca me bhagavato 'ntikādevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:492: tatsādhu bhagavānnirdiśatu yatsaṃghāya tathāgato gambhīrasya tathāgatadharmasya punaḥ punaḥ saṃvarṇanāṃ karoti //
S04bsu036_u:493: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:494: Saddhp_2.22 cirasyādya narāditya īdṛśīṃ kurute kathām /
S04bsu036_u:495: balā vimokṣā dhyānāśca aprameyā mi sparśitāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:496: Saddhp_2.23 bodhimaṇḍaṃ ca kīrtesi pṛcchakaste na vidyate /
S04bsu036_u:497: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ ca kīrtesi na ca tvāṃ kaści pṛcchati //
S04bsu036_u:498: Saddhp_2.24 apṛcchito vyāharasi caryāṃ varṇesi cātmanaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:501: nirvāṇaṃ prasthitā ye ca kimetad bhāṣate jinaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:506: Saddhp_2.28 yāvantaḥ śrāvakāḥ santi sugatasyeha sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:508: Saddhp_2.29 mamāpi saṃśayo hyatra svake sthāne narottama /
S04bsu036_u:509: kiṃ niṣṭhā mama nirvāṇe atha caryā mi darśitā //
S04bsu036_u:510: Saddhp_2.30 pramuñca ghoṣaṃ varadundubhisvarā udāharasvā yatha eṣa dharmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:511: ime sthitā putra jinasya aurasā vyavalokayantaśca kṛtāñjalī jinam //
S04bsu036_u:512: Saddhp_2.31 devāśca nāgāśca sayakṣarākṣasāḥ koṭīsahasrā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:513: ye cāpi prārthenti samagrabodhiṃ sahasraśītiḥ paripūrṇa ye sthitāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:514: Saddhp_2.32 rājāna ye mahipati cakravartino ye āgatāḥ kṣetrasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:515: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sagauravāḥ sthitāḥ kathaṃ nu caryāṃ paripūrayema //
S04bsu036_u:519: utrasiṣyati śāriputra ayaṃ sadevako loko 'sminnarthe vyākriyamāṇe /
S04bsu036_u:520: dvaitīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - bhāṣatāṃ bhagavān,
S04bsu036_u:523: santi bhagavaṃstasyāṃ parṣadi bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvabuddhadarśāvīni prajñāvanti,
S04bsu036_u:524: yāni bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śraddhāsyanti pratīyiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti //
S04bsu036_u:526: Saddhp_2.33 vispaṣṭu bhāṣasva jināna uttamā santīha parṣāya sahasra prāṇinām /
S04bsu036_u:527: śrāddhāḥ prasannāḥ sugate sagauravā jñāsyanti ye dharmamudāhṛtaṃ te //
S04bsu036_u:528: atha khalu bhagavān dvaitīyakamapyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - alaṃ śāriputra anenārthena prakāśitena /
S04bsu036_u:529: utrasiṣyati śāriputra ayaṃ sadevako loko 'sminnarthe vyākriyamāṇe /
S04bsu036_u:532: Saddhp_2.34 alaṃ hi dharmeṇiha bhāṣitena sūkṣmaṃ idaṃ jñānamatarkikaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:533: abhimānaprāptā bahu santi bālā nirdiṣṭadharmasmi kṣipe ajānakāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:535: traitīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - bhāṣatāṃ bhagavān,
S04bsu036_u:537: mādṛśānāṃ bhagavanniha parṣadi bahūni prāṇiśatāni saṃvidyante,
S04bsu036_u:538: anyāni ca bhagavan bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:540: tāni bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śraddhāsyanti pratīyiṣyanti udgahīṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:542: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:543: Saddhp_2.35 bhāṣasva dharmaṃ dvipadānamuttamā ahaṃ tvāmadhyeṣami jyeṣṭhaputraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:544: santīha prāṇīna sahasrakoṭayo ye śraddadhāsyanti te dharma bhāṣitam //
S04bsu036_u:545: Saddhp_2.36 ye ca tvayā pūrvabhaveṣu nityaṃ paripācitāḥ sattva sudīrgharātram /
S04bsu036_u:546: kṛtāñjalī te pi sthitātra sarve ye śraddadhāsyanti tavaita dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:547: Saddhp_2.37 asmādṛśā dvādaśime śatāśca ye cāpi te prasthita agrabodhaye /
S04bsu036_u:548: tān paśyamānaḥ sugataḥ prabhāṣatāṃ teṣāṃ ca harṣaṃ paramaṃ janetu //
S04bsu036_u:549: atha khalu bhagavāṃstraitīyakamapyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yadidānīṃ tvaṃ śāriputra yāvatraitīyakamapi tathāgatamadhyeṣase /
S04bsu036_u:551: tena hi śāriputra śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S04bsu036_u:554_0: atha khalu tataḥ parṣada ābhimānikānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:554_1: pañcamātrāṇi sahasrāṇyutthāya āsanebhyo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā tataḥ
S04bsu036_u:556: te ātmānaṃ savraṇaṃ jñātvā tataḥ parṣado 'pakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:558: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - nippalāvā me śāriputra parṣat apagataphalguḥ śraddhāsāre pratiṣṭhitā /
S04bsu036_u:563: bhagavānetadavocat - kadācit karhicicchāriputra tathāgata evaṃrūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayati /
S04bsu036_u:564: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra udumbarapuṣpaṃ kadācit karhicit saṃdṛśyate,
S04bsu036_u:565: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pi kadācit karhicit evaṃrūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayati /
S04bsu036_u:566: śraddadhata me śāriputra, bhūtavādyahamasmi, tathāvādyahamasmi, ananyathāvādyahamasmi /
S04bsu036_u:572: ekakṛtyena śāriputra ekakaraṇīyena tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate mahākṛtyena mahākaraṇīyena /
S04bsu036_u:573: katamaṃ ca śāriputra tathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyaṃ yena kṛtyena tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate?
S04bsu036_u:574: yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /
S04bsu036_u:576: tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /
S04bsu036_u:577: tathāgatajñānapratibodhanahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /
S04bsu036_u:579: idaṃ tacchāriputra tathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyamekaprayojanaṃ loke prādurbhāvāya /
S04bsu036_u:580: iti hi śāriputra yattathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyam,
S04bsu036_u:588: ekamevāhaṃ śāriputra yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharma deśayāmi yadidaṃ buddhayānam /
S04bsu036_u:589: na kiṃcicchāriputra dvitīyaṃ vā tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate /
S04bsu036_u:591: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye 'pi tu śāriputra atīta
S04bsu036_u:592_1: samyaksaṃbuddhā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya
S04bsu036_u:592_2: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:593: ye nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśitavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:594: te 'pi sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśitavantaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:597: yairapi śāriputra sattvaisteṣāmatītānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt saddharmaḥ śrutaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:600_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu
S04bsu036_u:600_1: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai
S04bsu036_u:600_2: mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S04bsu036_u:601: ye ca nānābhirnihāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:602: te 'pi sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam,
S04bsu036_u:604: ye 'pi te śāriputra sattvāsteṣāmanāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt taṃ dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:606: ye 'pi te śāriputra etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti ghriyante yāpayanti,
S04bsu036_u:607: dharmaṃ ca deśayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanahitāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S04bsu036_u:608: ye nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśayanti,

S04bsu036_u:967: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya dvādaśāntarakalpā āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā kumārabhūtatvam /
S04bsu036_u:969: sa ca śāriputra padmaprabhastathāgato dvādaśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena dhṛtiparipūrṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ vyākṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau parinirvāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:970: ayaṃ bhikṣavo dhṛtiparipūrṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
S04bsu036_u:971_0: padmavṛṣabhavikrāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu036_u:971_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:972: tasyāpi śāriputra padmavṛṣabhavikrāmiṇastathāgatasya evaṃrūpameva buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:973: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:974: tatastasya tasmin saddharme kṣīṇe dvātriṃśadantarakalpān saddharmapratirūpakaḥ sthāsyati //
S04bsu036_u:975: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:976: bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:977: Saddhp_3.23 bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:980: Saddhp_3.24 bahubuddhakoṭīṣu karitva satkriyāṃ caryābalaṃ tatra upārjayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:981: utpādayitvā ca daśo balāni spṛśiṣyase uttamamagrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:982: Saddhp_3.25 acintiye aparimitasmi kalpe prabhūtaratnastada kalpu bheṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:983: virajā ca nāmnā tada lokadhātuḥ kṣetraṃ viśuddhaṃ dvipadottamasya //
S04bsu036_u:984: Saddhp_3.26 vaidūryasaṃstīrṇa tathaiva bhūmiḥ suvarṇasūtrapratimaṇḍitā ca /
S04bsu036_u:987: ye śikṣitā buddhaśateṣu caryāṃ te tatra kṣetre upapadya santi //
S04bsu036_u:988: Saddhp_3.28 so cejjinaḥ paścimake samucchraye kumārabhūmīmatināmayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:990: Saddhp_3.29 sama dvādaśā antarakalpa tasya bhaviṣyate āyu tadā jinasya /
S04bsu036_u:991: manujānapī antarakalpa aṣṭa āyuṣpramāṇaṃ tahi teṣa bheṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:992: Saddhp_3.30 parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya dvātriṃśatiṃ antarakalpa pūrṇām /
S04bsu036_u:993: saddharma saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle hitāya lokasya sadevakasya //
S04bsu036_u:994: Saddhp_3.31 saddharmi kṣīṇe pratirūpako 'sya dvātriṃśatī antarakalpa sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:995: śarīravaistārika tasya tāyinaḥ susatkṛto naramarutaiśca nityam //
S04bsu036_u:996: Saddhp_3.32 etādṛśaḥ so bhagavān bhaviṣyati prahṛṣṭa tvaṃ śārisutā bhavasva /
S04bsu036_u:997: tvameva so tādṛśako bhaviṣyasi anābhibhūto dvipadānamuttamaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:998_2: saṃmukhaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ svakasvakaiścīvarairbhagavantamabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:999: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiranyāśca devaputraśatasahasrakoṭyo bhagavantaṃ divyairvastrairabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1002: divyāni ca tūryaśatasahasrāṇi dundubhayaścoparyantarīkṣe parāhananti sma /
S04bsu036_u:1003: mahāntaṃ ca puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣayitvā evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣante sma - pūrvaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyāmṛṣipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:1004: idaṃ punarbhagavatā adya anuttaraṃ dvitīyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:1005: te ca devaputrāstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣanta -
S04bsu036_u:1008: Saddhp_3.34 prathamaṃ pravartitaṃ tatra dvitīyamiha nāyaka /
S04bsu036_u:1014: Saddhp_3.37 vayamapyedṛśāḥ syāmo buddhā loke anuttarāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1019: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - niṣkāṅkṣo 'smi bhagavan vigatakathaṃkatho bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamidamātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:1020_0: yāni ca imāni bhagavan dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni bhagavatā pūrvaṃ śaikṣabhūmau sthāpitāni
S04bsu036_u:1020_1: evamavavaditāni evamanuśiṣṭānyabhūvan etatparyavasāno me bhikṣavo dharmavinayo yadidaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1021_0: ime ca bhagavan dve bhikṣusahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ sarveṣāmātmadṛṣṭibhavadṛṣṭivibhavadṛṣṭisarvadṛṣṭivivarjitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:1023: tatsādhu bhagavān bhāṣatāmeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyavinodanārtha yathā bhagavannetāścatasraḥ parṣado niṣkāṅkṣā nirvicikitsā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1024_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nanu te mayā śāriputra pūrvamevākhyātaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1024_2: sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:1026: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra aupamyaṃ te kariṣyāmi asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśanārtham /
S04bsu036_u:1027: tatkasya hetoḥ? upamayā iha ekatyā vijñapuruṣā bhāṣitasyārthamājānanti //
S04bsu036_u:1028_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra iha syāt kasmiṃścideva grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade
S04bsu036_u:1028_1: vā janapadapradeśe vā rāṣṭre vā rājadhānyāṃ vā gṛhapatirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako 'bhyatītavayo
S04bsu036_u:1029: mahaccāsya niveśanaṃ bhaveducchritaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca cirakṛtaṃ ca jīrṇaṃ ca dvayorvā trayāṇāṃ vā caturṇāṃ vā pañcānāṃ vā prāṇiśatānāmāvāsaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1035: tacca sahasaiva mahātāgniskandhena sarvapārśveṣu sarvāvantaṃ niveśanaṃ pradīptaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1036: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ kumārakāḥ syuḥ pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā /
S04bsu036_u:1038: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣastaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ mahātāgniskandhena samantāt
S04bsu036_u:1040: evaṃ cānuvicintayet - pratibalo 'hamanena mahatāgniskandhenāsaṃspṛṣṭo 'paridagdhaḥ kṣiprameva svastinā asmād gṛhādādīptād dvāreṇa nirgantuṃ nirdhāvitum /
S04bsu036_u:1041: api tu ya ime mamaiva putrā bālakāḥ kumārakā asminneva niveśane ādīpte taistaiḥ krīḍanakaiḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti,
S04bsu036_u:1042: imaṃ cāgāramādīptaṃ na jānanti na budhyante na vidanti na cetayanti nodvegamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:1043: saṃtapyamānā apyanena mahatāgniskandhena mahatā ca duḥkhaskandhena spṛṣṭāḥ samānā na duḥkhaṃ manasi kurvanti,
S04bsu036_u:1046: sa ca śāriputra puruṣo balavān bhaved bāhubalikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1048: yannvahaṃ sarvānimān kumārakānekapiṇḍayitvā utsaṅgenādāya asmād gṛhānnirgamayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1049: sa punarevamanuvicintayet - idaṃ khalu niveśanamekapraveśaṃ saṃvṛtadvārameva /
S04bsu036_u:1054: iti pratisaṃkhyāya tān kumārakānāmantrayate sma - āgacchata bhavantaḥ kumārakāḥ, nirgacchata /
S04bsu036_u:1056: mā haivātraiva sarve 'nena mahatāgniskandhena dhakṣyatha, anayavyasanamāpatsyatha /
S04bsu036_u:1057: atha khalu te kumārakā evaṃ tasya hitakāmasya puruṣasya tadbhāṣitaṃ nāvabudhyante nodvijanti notrasanti na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:1059: nāpi jānanti na vijānanti kimetadādīptaṃ nāmeti /
S04bsu036_u:1060: anyatra tena tenaiva dhāvanti vidhāvanti, punaḥ punaśca taṃ pitaramavalokayanti /
S04bsu036_u:1062: atha khalu sa puruṣa evamanuvicintayet - ādīptamidaṃ niveśanaṃ mahatāgniskandhena saṃpradīptam /
S04bsu036_u:1063: mā haivāhaṃ ceme ca kumārakā ihaivānena mahātāgniskandhena anayavyasanamāpatsyāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:1065: sa ca puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayajño bhavet, adhimuktiṃ ca vijānīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:1066: teṣāṃ ca kumārakāṇāmanekavidhānyanekāni krīḍanakāni bhaveyurvividhāni ca ramaṇīyakānīṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manaāpāni,
S04bsu036_u:1068: atha khalu sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayaṃ jānaṃstān kumārakānetadavocat - yāni tāni kumārakā yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakānyāścaryādbhutāni,
S04bsu036_u:1073: tāni ca mayā sarvāṇi bahinirveśanadvāre sthāpitāni yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanahetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1075: ahaṃ vo yasya yasya yenārtho yena prayojanaṃ bhaviṣyati, tasmai tasmai tatpradāsyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:1077_0: atha khalu te kumārakāsteṣāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ ramaṇīyakānāmarthāya yathepsitānāṃ yathāsaṃkalpitānāmiṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:1077_1: kāntānāṃ priyāṇāṃ manaāpānāṃ nāmadheyāni śrutvā tasmādādīptādagārāt kṣipramevārabdhavīryā
S04bsu036_u:1077_2: balavatā javena anyonyamapratīkṣamāṇāḥ kaḥ prathamaṃ kaḥ prathamataramityanyonyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1078: atha sa puruṣaḥ kṣemasvastinā tān kumārakān nirgatān dṛṣṭvā abhayaprāptāniti viditvā ākāśe grāmacatvare upaviṣṭaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto nirupādāno vigatanīvaraṇo 'bhayaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1079: atha khalu te kumārakā yena sa pitā tenopasaṃkrāman,
S04bsu036_u:1080: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadeyuḥ - dehi nastāta tāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyāni /
S04bsu036_u:1082_0: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣasteṣāṃ svakānāṃ putrāṇāṃ vātajavasaṃpannān [Vaidya_53]
S04bsu036_u:1084: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra sa puruṣa āḍhyaśca bhavenmahādhanaśca prabhūtakoṣṭhāgāraśca /
S04bsu036_u:1085: sa evaṃ manyeta - alaṃ ma eṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmanyairyānairdattairiti /
S04bsu036_u:1086: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarva evaite kumārakā mamaiva putrāḥ, sarve ca me priyā manaāpāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1088: samaṃ ca mayaite kumārakāḥ sarve cintayitavyā na viṣamam /
S04bsu036_u:1090: sarvasattvānāmapyahamimānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāyānāni dadyām, kimaṅga punaḥ svakānāṃ putrāṇām /
S04bsu036_u:1091: te ca dārakāstasmin samaye teṣu mahāyāneṣvabhiruhya āścaryādbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1092: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra mā haiva tasya puruṣasya mṛṣāvādaḥ syāt,
S04bsu036_u:1093: yena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścātsarveṣāṃ mahāyānānyeva dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:1095: śāriputra āha - na hyetad bhagavan, na hyetat sugata /
S04bsu036_u:1096: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhaved yattena puruṣeṇopāyakauśalyena te dārakāstasmādādīptād gṛhānniṣkāsitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1098: tatkasya hetoḥ? ātmabhāvapratilambhenaiva bhagavan sarvakrīḍanakāni labdhāni bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:1099: yadyapi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekarathamapi na dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:1100: tathāpi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1102: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa pūrvameva evamanuvicintitam - upāyakauśalyena ahamimān kumārakāṃstasmānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:1103: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1104: kaḥ punarvādo yattena puruṣeṇa prabhūtakośakoṣṭhāgāramastīti kṛtvā putrapriyatāmeva manyamānena ślāghamānenaikavarṇānyekayānāni dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:1107: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
S04bsu036_u:1113: sa utpannaḥ samānaḥ paśyati sattvān dahyataḥ pacyamānāṃstapyamānān paritapyamānān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1114: paribhoganimittaṃ ca kāmahetunidānaṃ ca anekāvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:1115: dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ ca paryeṣṭinidānaṃ parigrahanidānaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokeṣvanekavidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:1117_0: tatraiva ca duḥkhaskandhe parivartamānāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti notrasanti
S04bsu036_u:1117_1: na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante na budhyante na cetayanti nodvijanti na niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
S04bsu036_u:1118: tatraiva ca ādīptāgārasadṛśe traidhātuke 'bhiramanti, tena tenaiva vidhāvanti /
S04bsu036_u:1119: tena ca mahatā duḥkhaskandhena abhyāhatā na duḥkhamanasikārasaṃjñāmutpādayanti //
S04bsu036_u:1120: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - ahaṃ khalveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pitā /
S04bsu036_u:1121: mayā hyete sattvā asmādevaṃrūpānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1125: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - sacedahaṃ jñānabalo 'smīti kṛtvā ṛddhibalo 'smīti kṛtvā anupāyenaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānabalavaiśāradyāni saṃśrāvayeyam,
S04bsu036_u:1127: tatkasya hetoḥ? adhyavasitā hyamī sattvāḥ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣu traidhātukaratyām /
S04bsu036_u:1131: tatra śāriputra tathāgato yadyathāpi nāma sa puruṣo bāhubalikaḥ sthāpayitvā bāhubalam,
S04bsu036_u:1133: niṣkāsayitvā sa teṣāṃ paścādudārāṇi mahāyānāni dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:1135: upāyakauśalyajñānenādīptajīrṇapaṭalaśaraṇaniveśanasadṛśāt traidhātukāt sattvānāṃ niṣkāsanahetostrīṇi yānānyupadarśayati yadut śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
S04bsu036_u:1137: evaṃ caiṣāṃ vadati - mā bhavanto 'sminnādīptāgārasadṛśe traidhātuke 'bhiramadhvaṃ hīneṣu rūpaśabdagandharasasparśeṣu /
S04bsu036_u:1138: atra hi yūyaṃ traidhātuke 'bhiratāḥ pañcakāmaguṇasahagatayā tṛṣṇayā dahyatha tapyatha paritapyatha /
S04bsu036_u:1140: trīṇi yānānyanuprāpsyatha yadidaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
S04bsu036_u:1144: evaṃ caitāṃllobhayāmi - etāni bhoḥ sattvā yāni āryāṇi ca āryapraśastāni ca mahāramaṇīyakasamanvāgatāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:1149: tatra śāriputra ye sattvāḥ paṇḍitajātīyā bhavanti, te tathāgatasya lokapiturabhiśraddadhanti /
S04bsu036_u:1153: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā mṛgarathamākāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1154: anye sattvā anācāryakaṃ jñānaṃ damaśamathamākāṅkṣamāṇā ātmaparinirvāṇahetorhetupratyayānubodhāya tathāgataśāsane 'bhiyujyante,
S04bsu036_u:1156: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā ajarathamāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1157_0: apare punaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ buddhajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamanācāryakaṃ jñānamākāṅkṣamāṇā
S04bsu036_u:1157_1: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
S04bsu036_u:1161_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra sa puruṣastān kumārakāṃstasmādādīptādagārānnirdhāvitān
S04bsu036_u:1161_1: dṛṣṭvā kṣemasvastibhyāṃ parimuktānabhayaprāptāniti viditvā ātmānaṃ ca mahādhanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1162_0: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā paśyati - anekāḥ sattvakoṭīstraidhātukāt
S04bsu036_u:1164_0: tānetān śāriputra tasmin samaye tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prabhūto mahājñānabalavaiśāradyakośa
S04bsu036_u:1164_1: iti viditvā sarve caite mamaiva putrā iti jñātvā buddhayānenaiva tān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:1165: na ca kasyacit sattvasya pratyātmikaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadati /

S04bsu036_u:1455: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣasya pitā bahudhanahiraṇyakośakoṣṭhāgārastasmin nagare vasamānastaṃ pañcāśadvarṣanaṣṭaṃ putraṃ satatasamitamanusmaret /

S04bsu036_u:1473: atha khalu bhagavan sa āḍhyaḥ puruṣaḥ svake niveśanadvāre siṃhāsane upaviṣṭastaṃ svakaṃ putraṃ sahadarśanenaiva pratyabhijānīyāt /

S04bsu036_u:1475: evaṃ ca cintayet - āścaryaṃ yāvad yatra hi nāma asya mahato hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya paribhoktā upalabdhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1479: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ putratṛṣṇāsaṃpīḍitastasmin kṣaṇalavamuhūrte javanān puruṣān saṃpreṣayet - gacchata mārṣā etaṃ puruṣaṃ śīghramānayadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:1480: atha khalu bhagavaṃste puruṣāḥ rsava eva javena pradhāvitāstaṃ daridrapuruṣamadhyālambeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1481: atha khalu daridrapuruṣastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvigramānaso dāruṇamārtasvaraṃ muñcedāraved viravet /
S04bsu036_u:1483: atha khalu te puruṣā balātkāreṇa taṃ [Vaidya_73] daridrapuruṣaṃ viravantamapyākarṣeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1484: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣo bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna udvignamānasa evaṃ ca cintayet - mā tāvadahaṃ vadhyo daṇḍayo bhaveyam /
S04bsu036_u:1486: sa mūrchito dharaṇyāṃ prapatet, visaṃjñaśca syāt /
S04bsu036_u:1488: sa tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanta etaṃ puruṣamānayantviti /
S04bsu036_u:1489: tamenaṃ śītalena vāriṇā parisiñcitvā na bhūya ālapet /
S04bsu036_u:1490: tatkasya hetoḥ? jānāti sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya hīnādhimuktikatāmātmanaścodārasthāmatām /
S04bsu036_u:1492: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatirupāyakauśalyena na kasyacidācakṣet - mamaiṣa putra iti /
S04bsu036_u:1493: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatiranyataraṃ puruṣamāmantrayet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:1494: enaṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadasva - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:1496: evaṃ vadati sa puruṣastasmai pratiśrutya yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1497: upasaṃkramya taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:1499: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣa idaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1500: sa utthāya tasmāt pṛthivīpradeśādyena daridravīthī tenopasaṃkrāmedāhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1502: sa tatra dvau puruṣau prayojayet durvarṇāvalpaujaskau - gacchatāṃ bhavantau yo 'sau puruṣa ihāgato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:1503: taṃ yuvāṃ dviguṇayā divasamudrayā ātmavacanenaiva bharayitveha mama niveśane karma kārāpayethām /
S04bsu036_u:1504: sacet sa evaṃ vadet - kiṃ karma kartavyamiti,
S04bsu036_u:1505: sa yuvābhyāmevaṃ vaktavyaḥ - saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ sahāvābhyāmiti /
S04bsu036_u:1506: atha tau puruṣau taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ paryeṣayitvā tayā kriyayā saṃpādayetām /
S04bsu036_u:1507: atha khalu tau dvau puruṣau sa ca daridrapuruṣo vetanaṃ gṛhītvā tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasyāntikāttasminneva niveśane saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1508: tasyaiva ca mahādhanasya puruṣasya gṛhaparisare kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1509: sa cāḍhyaḥ puruṣo gavākṣavātāyanena taṃ svakaṃ putraṃ paśyet saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayamānam /
S04bsu036_u:1511: atha khalu sa gṛhapatiḥ svakānniveśanādavatīrya apanayitvā mālyābharaṇani,
S04bsu036_u:1514: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā piṭakaṃ parigṛhya pāṃsunā svagātraṃ dūṣayitvā dūrata eva saṃbhāṣamāṇo yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1515: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadet - vahantu bhavantaḥ piṭakāni, mā tiṣṭhata, harata pāṃsūni /
S04bsu036_u:1517: enaṃ vadet - ihaiva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa karma kuruṣva /
S04bsu036_u:1520: yena yena ca te kārya bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1522: yadi vā kuṇḍamūlyena yadi vā kuṇḍikāmūlyena yadi vā sthālikāmūlyena yadi vā kāṣṭhamūlyena yadi vā lavaṇamūlyena yadi vā bhojanena yadi vā prāvaraṇena /
S04bsu036_u:1524: sacettayā te kāryaṃ syāt, yāceḥ, ahaṃ te 'nupradāsyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:1525: yena yena te bhoḥ puruṣa kāryamevaṃrūpeṇa pariṣkāreṇa, taṃ tamevāhaṃ te sarvamanupradāsyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:1528: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahaṃ [Vaidya_74] ca vṛddhaḥ, tvaṃ ca daharaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1529: mama ca tvayā bahu karma kṛtamimaṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayatā /
S04bsu036_u:1530: na ca tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa atra karma kurvatā śāṭhayaṃ vā vakratā vā kauṭilyaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā kṛtapūrvaḥ, karoṣi vā /
S04bsu036_u:1531: sarvathā te bhoḥ puruṣa na samanupaśyāmyekamapi pāpakarma,
S04bsu036_u:1532: yathaiṣāmanyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karma kurvatāmime doṣāḥ saṃvidyante /
S04bsu036_u:1533: yādṛśo me putra aurasaḥ, tādṛśastvaṃ mama adyāgreṇa bhavasi //
S04bsu036_u:1534: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya putra iti nāma kuryāt /
S04bsu036_u:1536: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa sa gṛhapatiḥ putrakāmatṛṣito viṃśativarṣāṇi taṃ putraṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:1537: atha viṃśatervarṣāṇāmatyayena sa daridrapuruṣastasya gṛhapaterniveśane viśrabdho bhavenniṣkramaṇapraveśe,
S04bsu036_u:1539: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya gṛhapaterglānyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1540: sa maraṇakālasamayaṃ ca ātmanaḥ pratyupasthitaṃ samanupaśyet /
S04bsu036_u:1541: sa taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:1544: icchāmyetaṃ yasya dātavyaṃ yataśca grahītavyaṃ yacca nidhātavyaṃ bhavet, sarvaṃ saṃjānīyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1545: tatkasya hetoḥ? yādṛśa eva ahamasya dravyasya svāmī, tādṛśastvamapi /
S04bsu036_u:1546: mā ca me tvaṃ kiṃcidato vipraṇāśayiṣyasi //
S04bsu036_u:1547: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo 'nena paryāyeṇa tacca tasya gṛhapateḥ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ saṃjānīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:1549: na ca tasmāt kiṃcit prārthayet, antaśaḥ saktuprasthamūlyamātramapi /
S04bsu036_u:1550: tatraiva ca kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayet, tāmeva daridracintāmanuvicintayamānaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1551_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistaṃ putraṃ śaktaṃ paripālakaṃ paripakvaṃ viditvā
S04bsu036_u:1551_1: avamarditacittamudārasaṃjñayā ca paurvikayā daridracintayā ārtīyantaṃ jehrīyamāṇaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1551_2: jugupsamānaṃ viditvā maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite taṃ daridrapuruṣamānāyya mahato
S04bsu036_u:1551_3: jñātisaṃghasyopanāmayitvā rājño vā rājamātrasya vā purato naigamajānapadānāṃ ca saṃmukhamevaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1552: ayaṃ mama putra auraso mayaiva janitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1559: yaḥ kaścinmamopabhogo 'sti, taṃ sarvamasmai puruṣāya niryātayāmi /
S04bsu036_u:1560: yacca me kiṃcidasti pratyātmakaṃ dhanam, tatsarvameṣa eva jānāti //
S04bsu036_u:1561: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣastasmin samaye imamevaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1562: evaṃ ca vicintayet - sahasaiva mayedameva tāvad hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ pratilabdhamiti //
S04bsu036_u:1565: tathāgataśca asmākamevaṃ vadati - putrā mama yūyamiti, yathā sa gṛhapatiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1567: katamābhistisṛbhiḥ? yaduta duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca /
S04bsu036_u:1569: tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1571: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1572: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1573: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā /
S04bsu036_u:1581: tata evaṃ jānīma - etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:1582: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1586: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam - yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1588: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti, api tu khalu punarhīnādhimuktāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1590: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ - bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1595: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
S04bsu036_u:1596: Saddhp_4.1 āścaryabhūtāḥ sma tathādbhutāśca audbilyaprāptāḥ sma śruṇitva ghoṣam /
S04bsu036_u:1597: sahasaiva asmābhirayaṃ tathādya manojñaghoṣaḥ śrutu nāyakasya //
S04bsu036_u:1601: na cintito nāpi kadāci prārthitastaṃ śrutva āścaryagatāḥ sma sarve //
S04bsu036_u:1602: Saddhp_4.3 yathāpi bālaḥ puruṣo bhaveta utplāvito bālajanena santaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1603: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram //
S04bsu036_u:1604: Saddhp_4.4 pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle palāyitaṃ jñātva svakaṃ hi putram /
S04bsu036_u:1605: śocantu so digvidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśadanūnakāni //
S04bsu036_u:1606: Saddhp_4.5 tathā ca so putra gaveṣamāṇo anyaṃ mahantaṃ nagaraṃ hi gatvā /
S04bsu036_u:1607: niveśanaṃ māpiya tatra tiṣṭhet samarpito kāmugaṇehi pañcabhiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1608: Saddhp_4.6 bahuṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyaṃ dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālam /
S04bsu036_u:1609: hastī ca aśvāśca padātayaśca gāvaḥ paśūścaiva tathaiḍakāśca //
S04bsu036_u:1610: Saddhp_4.7 prayoga āyoga tathaiva kṣetrā dāsī ca dāsā bahu preṣyavargaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1611: susatkṛtaḥ prāṇisahasrakoṭibhī rājñaśca so vallabhu nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:1612: Saddhp_4.8 kṛtāñjalī tasya bhavanti nāgarā grāmeṣu ye cāpi vasanti grāmiṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1613: bahuvāṇijāstasya vrajanti antike bahūhi kāryehi kṛtādhikārāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1614: Saddhp_4.9 etādṛśo ṛddhimato naraḥ syājjīrṇaśca vṛddhaśca mahallakaśca /
S04bsu036_u:1615: sa putraśokaṃ anucintayantaḥ kṣapeya rātriṃdiva nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:1616: Saddhp_4.10 sa tādṛśo durmati mahya putraḥ pañcāśa varṣāṇi tadā palānakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1617: ayaṃ ca kośo vipulo mamāsti kālakriyā co mama pratyupasthitā //
S04bsu036_u:1618: Saddhp_4.11 so cāpi bālo tada tasya putro daridrakaḥ kṛpaṇaku nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:1619: grāmeṇa grāmaṃ anucaṃkramantaḥ paryeṣate bhakta athāpi colam //
S04bsu036_u:1620: Saddhp_4.12 paryeṣamāṇo 'pi kadāci kiṃcillabheta kiṃcit puna naiva kiṃcit /
S04bsu036_u:1621: sa śuṣyate paraśaraṇeṣu bālo dadrūya kaṇḍūya ca digdhagātraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1622: Saddhp_4.13 so ca vrajettaṃ nagaraṃ yahiṃ pitā anupūrvaśo tatra gato bhaveta /
S04bsu036_u:1623: bhaktaṃ ca colaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇo niveśanaṃ yatra pituḥ svakasya //
S04bsu036_u:1624: Saddhp_4.14 so cāpi āḍhyaḥ puruṣo mahādhano dvārasmi siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1626: Saddhp_4.15 āpto janaścāsya samantataḥ sthito dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca gaṇenti kecit /
S04bsu036_u:1627: kecittu lekhānapi lekhayanti kecit prayogaṃ ca prayojayanti //
S04bsu036_u:1628: Saddhp_4.16 so cā daridro tahi etu dṛṣṭvā vibhūṣitaṃ gṛhapatino niveśanam /
S04bsu036_u:1629: kahiṃ nu adya ahamatra āgato rājā ayaṃ bheṣyati rājamātraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1630: mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1631: Saddhp_4.17 mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1633: anucintayantaḥ sa palāyate naro daridravīthīṃ paripṛcchamānaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1634: Saddhp_4.18 so cā dhanī taṃ svaku putra dṛṣṭvā siṃhāsanasthaśca bhavet prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1635: sa dūtakān preṣayi tasya antike ānetha etaṃ puruṣaṃ daridram //
S04bsu036_u:1636: Saddhp_4.19 samanantaraṃ tehi gṛhītu so naro gṛhītamātro 'tha ca mūrccha gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:1637: dhrūvaṃ khu mahyaṃ vadhakā upasthitāḥ kiṃ mahya colenatha bhojanena vā //
S04bsu036_u:1638: Saddhp_4.20 dṛṣṭvā ca so paṇḍitu taṃ mahādhanī hīnādhimukto ayu bāla durmatiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1639: na śraddadhī mahyamimāṃ vibhūṣitāṃ pitā mamāyaṃ ti na cāpi śraddadhīt //
S04bsu036_u:1640: Saddhp_4.21 puruṣāṃśca so tatra prayojayeta vaṅkāśca ye kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāśca /
S04bsu036_u:1641: kucelakāḥ kṛṣṇaka hīnasattvāḥ paryeṣathā taṃ naru karmakārakam //
S04bsu036_u:1642: Saddhp_4.22 saṃkāradhānaṃ imu mahya pūtikamuccāraprasrāvavināśitaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:1643: taṃ śodhanārthāya karohi karma dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ pradāsye //
S04bsu036_u:1644: Saddhp_4.23 etādṛśaṃ ghoṣa śruṇitva so naro āgatya saṃśodhayi taṃ pradeśam /
S04bsu036_u:1646: Saddhp_4.24 so cā dhanī taṃ puruṣaṃ nirīkṣed gavākṣaolokanake 'pi nityam /
S04bsu036_u:1647: hīnādhimukto ayu mahya putraḥ saṃkāradhānaṃ śucikaṃ karoti //
S04bsu036_u:1648: Saddhp_4.25 sa otaritvā piṭakaṃ gṛhītvā malināni vastrāṇi ca prāvaritvā /
S04bsu036_u:1649: upasaṃkramettasya narasya antike avabhartsayanto na karotha karma //
S04bsu036_u:1650: Saddhp_4.26 dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ dadāmi dviguṇāṃ ca bhūyastatha pādamrakṣaṇam /
S04bsu036_u:1651: saloṇabhaktaṃ ca dadāmi tubhya śākaṃ ca śāṭiṃ ca punardadāmi //
S04bsu036_u:1652: Saddhp_4.27 evaṃ ca taṃ bhartsiya tasmi kāle saṃśleṣayettaṃ punareva paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1653: suṣṭhuṃ khalū karma karoṣi atra putro 'si vyaktaṃ mama nātra saṃśayaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1654: Saddhp_4.28 sa stokastokaṃ ca gṛhaṃ praveśayet karmaṃ ca kārāpayi taṃ manuṣyam /
S04bsu036_u:1655: viṃśacca varṣāṇi supūritāni krameṇa viśrambhayi taṃ naraṃ saḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1656: Saddhp_4.29 hiraṇyu so mauktiku sphāṭikaṃ ca pratisāmayettatra niveśanasmin /
S04bsu036_u:1657: sarvaṃ ca so saṃgaṇanāṃ karoti arthaṃ ca sarvaṃ anucintayeta //
S04bsu036_u:1658: Saddhp_4.30 bahirdhā so tasya niveśanasya kuṭikāya eko vasamānu bālaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1659: daridracintāmanucintayeta na me 'sti etādṛśa bhoga kecit //
S04bsu036_u:1660: Saddhp_4.31 jñātvā ca so tasya imevarūpamudārasaṃjñābhigato mi putraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1663: Saddhp_4.32 rājāna so naigamanāgarāṃśca samānayitvā bahuvāṇijāṃśca /
S04bsu036_u:1665: uvāca evaṃ pariṣāya madhye putro mamāyaṃ cira vipranaṣṭakaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1666: Saddhp_4.33 pañcāśa varṣāṇi supūrṇakāni anye ca 'to viṃśatiye mi dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1667: amukātu nagarātu mamaiṣa naṣṭo ahaṃ ca mārganta ihaivamāgataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1668: Saddhp_4.34 sarvasya dravyasya ayaṃ prabhurme etasya niryātayi sarvaśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1669: karotu kāryaṃ ca piturdhanena sarvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ ca dadāmi etat //
S04bsu036_u:1670: Saddhp_4.35 āścaryaprāptaśca bhavennaro 'sau daridrabhāvaṃ purimaṃ smaritvā /
S04bsu036_u:1671: hīnādhimuktiṃ ca pituśca tān guṇāṃllabdhvā kuṭumbaṃ sukhito 'smi adya //
S04bsu036_u:1672: Saddhp_4.36 tathaiva cāsmāka vināyakena hīnādhimuktitva vijāniyāna /
S04bsu036_u:1673: na śrāvitaṃ buddha bhaviṣyatheti yūyaṃ kila śrāvaka mahya putrāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1674: Saddhp_4.37 asmāṃśca adhyeṣati lokanātho ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:1675: teṣāṃ vade kāśyapa mārga nuttaraṃ yaṃ mārga bhāvitva bhaveyu buddhāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1676: Saddhp_4.38 vayaṃ ca teṣāṃ sugatena preṣitā bahubodhisattvāna mahābalānām /
S04bsu036_u:1678: Saddhp_4.39 śrutvā ca asmāku jinasya putrā bodhāya bhāventi sumārgamagryam /
S04bsu036_u:1679: te vyākriyante ca kṣaṇasmi tasmin bhaviṣyathā buddha imasmi loke //
S04bsu036_u:1680: Saddhp_4.40 etādṛśaṃ karma karoma tāyinaḥ saṃrakṣamāṇā ima dharmakośam /
S04bsu036_u:1681: prakāśayantaśca jinātmajānāṃ vaiśvāsikastasya yathā naraḥ saḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1682: Saddhp_4.41 daridracintāśca vicintayāma viśrāṇayanto imu buddhakośam /
S04bsu036_u:1683: na caiva prārthema jinasya jñānaṃ jinasya jñānaṃ ca prakāśayāmaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1684: Saddhp_4.42 pratyātmikīṃ nirvṛti kalpayāma etāvatā jñānamidaṃ na bhūyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1685: nāsmāka harṣo 'pi kadācia bhoti kṣetreṣu buddhāna śruṇitva vyūhān //
S04bsu036_u:1686: Saddhp_4.43 śāntāḥ kilā sarvimi dharmanāsravā nirodhautpādavivarjitāśca /
S04bsu036_u:1687: na cātra kaścidbhavatīha dharmo evaṃ tu cintetva na bhoti śraddhā //
S04bsu036_u:1688: Saddhp_4.44 suniḥspṛhā smā vaya dīrgharātraṃ bauddhasya jñānasya anuttarasya /
S04bsu036_u:1689: praṇidhānamasmāka na jātu tatra iyaṃ parā niṣṭha jinena uktā //
S04bsu036_u:1690: Saddhp_4.45 nirvāṇaparyanti samucchraye 'smin paribhāvitā śūnyata dīrgharātram /
S04bsu036_u:1691: parimukta traidhātukaduḥkhapīḍitāḥ kṛtaṃ ca asmābhi jinasya śāsanam //
S04bsu036_u:1692: Saddhp_4.46 yaṃ hi prakāśema jinātmajānāṃ ye prasthitā bhonti ihāgrabodhau /
S04bsu036_u:1693: teṣāṃ ca yatkiṃci vadāma dharmaṃ spṛha tatra asmāka na jātu bhoti //
S04bsu036_u:1694: Saddhp_4.47 taṃ cāsma lokācariyaḥ svayaṃbhūrupekṣate kālamavekṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1696: Saddhp_4.48 upāyakauśalya yathaiva tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasya kāle /
S04bsu036_u:1697: hīnādhimuktaṃ satataṃ dameti damiyāna cāsmai pradadāti vittam //
S04bsu036_u:1698: Saddhp_4.49 suduṣkaraṃ kurvati lokanātho upāyakauśalya prakāśayantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1699: hīnādhimuktān damayantu putrān dametva ca jñānamidaṃ dadāti //
S04bsu036_u:1700: Saddhp_4.50 āścaryaprāptāḥ sahasā sma adya yathā daridro labhiyāna vittam /
S04bsu036_u:1701: phalaṃ ca prāptaṃ iha buddhāśāsane prathamaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ca anāsravaṃ ca //
S04bsu036_u:1702: Saddhp_4.51 yacchīlamasmābhi ca dīrgharātraṃ saṃrakṣitaṃ lokavidusya śāsane /
S04bsu036_u:1703: asmābhi labdhaṃ phalamadya tasya śīlasya pūrvaṃ caritasya nātha //
S04bsu036_u:1704: Saddhp_4.52 yad brahmacaryaṃ paramaṃ viśuddhaṃ niṣevitaṃ śāsani nāyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:1705: tasyo viśiṣṭaṃ phalamadya labdhaṃ śāntaṃ udāraṃ ca anāsravaṃ ca //
S04bsu036_u:1706: Saddhp_4.53 adyo vayaṃ śrāvakabhūta nātha saṃśrāvayiṣyāmatha cāgrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:1707: bodhīya śabdaṃ ca prakāśayāmasteno vayaṃ śrāvaka bhīṣmakalpāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1708: Saddhp_4.54 arhantabhūtā vayamadya nātha arhāmahe pūja sadevakātaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1709: lokātsamārātu sabrahmakātaḥ sarveṣa sattvāna ca antikātaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1710: Saddhp_4.55 ko nāma śaktaḥ pratikartu tubhyamudyuktarūpo bahukalpakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1712: Saddhp_4.56 hastehi pādehi śireṇa cāpi pratipriyaṃ duṣkarakaṃ hi kartum /
S04bsu036_u:1713: śireṇa aṃsena ca yo dhareta paripūrṇakalpān yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1714: Saddhp_4.57 khādyaṃ dadedbhojanavastrapānaṃ śayanāsanaṃ co vimalottaracchadam /
S04bsu036_u:1715: vihāra kārāpayi candanāmayān saṃstīrya co dūṣyayugehi dadyāt //
S04bsu036_u:1716: Saddhp_4.58 gilānabhaiṣajya bahuprakāraṃ pūjārtha dadyāt sugatasya nityam /
S04bsu036_u:1717: dadeya kalpān yatha gaṅgavālikā naivaṃ kadācit pratikartu śakyam //

S04bsu036_u:2607: sarve ca te śrāmaṇerā abhūvan paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ kuśalā bahubuddhaśatasahasracaritāvino 'rthinaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2608_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:2608_2: bahūni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi maharddhikāni mahānubhāvāni maheśākhyāni bhagavato
S04bsu036_u:2609: tat sādhu bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'smākamanukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya dharmaṃ deśayatu,
S04bsu036_u:2613: tvaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvāśayajño jānīṣe asmākamadhyāśayamiti //
S04bsu036_u:2615: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tān bālān dārakān rājakumārān pravrajitān śrāmaṇerān dṛṣṭvā yāvāṃstasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ parivāraḥ,
S04bsu036_u:2617_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:2617_2: nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ
S04bsu036_u:2617_3: vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām //
S04bsu036_u:2618: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ te ṣodaśa rājakumārāḥ śrāmaṇerā udgṛhītavanto dhāritavanta ārādhitavantaḥ paryāptavantaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2619: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān vyākārṣīdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:2620: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śrāvakāścādhimuktavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2621: te ca ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerā bahūni ca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vicikitsāprāptānyabhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:2622_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
S04bsu036_u:2622_1: imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamaṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇyaviśrānto bhāṣitvā vihāraṃ
S04bsu036_u:2623: tathā pratisaṃlīnaśca bhikṣavaḥ sa tathāgataścaturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi vihārasthita evāsīt //
S04bsu036_u:2624_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:2624_1: tathāgataṃ pratisaṃlīnaṃ viditvā pṛthak pṛthag dharmāsanāni siṃhāsanāni prajñāpya
S04bsu036_u:2624_2: teṣu niṣaṇṇāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ namaskṛtya taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
S04bsu036_u:2624_3: dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ caturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi saṃprakāśitavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2625_0: tatra bhikṣava ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇero bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:2625_1: samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavānavatāritavān //
S04bsu036_u:2626: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:2628: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu036_u:2630: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin dharmāsane,
S04bsu036_u:2632: paryupāsadhvaṃ bhikṣava etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2633: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ [Vaidya_119] śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā eṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ na pratikṣepsyanti /
S04bsu036_u:2637: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulaputraistasya bhagavataḥ śāsane 'yaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃprakāśito 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:2638_0: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇerairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairyāni tānyekaikena
S04bsu036_u:2639: sarvāṇi ca tāni taireva sārdhaṃ tāsu tāsu jātiṣvanupravrajitāni /
S04bsu036_u:2644: ye te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:2646: sarve ca ta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti /
S04bsu036_u:2647: daśasu dikṣu nānābuddhakṣetreṣu bahūnāṃ śrāvakabodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:2648: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'bhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvakṣobhyo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukūṭaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2649: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2650: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nityaparinirvṛtaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2651: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho brahmadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2652: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'mitāyuśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2653: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavastamālapatracandanagandhābhijñaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukalpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2654: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho meghasvararājaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2655: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2656: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2657_0: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya
S04bsu036_u:2657_1: bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni
S04bsu036_u:2661: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ duradhimocyaṃ hi bhikṣavastathāgatajñānam [Vaidya_120] /
S04bsu036_u:2663: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvajñatādharmamanuśrāvitāni?
S04bsu036_u:2664: yūyaṃ te bhikṣavastena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:2665: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate 'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:2668: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:2669: api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
S04bsu036_u:2671: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:2675: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati,
S04bsu036_u:2676: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
S04bsu036_u:2677: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati /
S04bsu036_u:2678: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā, kaḥ punarvādastṛtīyasya?
S04bsu036_u:2679: upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām - dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
S04bsu036_u:2681: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram /
S04bsu036_u:2682: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:2683: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām /
S04bsu036_u:2685: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet - yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ - vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2688: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet - mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti /
S04bsu036_u:2690: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:2691: tatastān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanto bhaiṣṭa, mā nivartadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:2694: atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam /
S04bsu036_u:2696: yasya punaḥ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati, sa taṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ gamiṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:2697: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ - muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt /
S04bsu036_u:2699: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:2703: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:2704: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2706: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti //
S04bsu036_u:2708: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yuṣmākaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca deśikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2710: paśyati - mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam /
S04bsu036_u:2711: mā khalvime ekameva buddhajñānaṃ śrutvā draveṇaiva pratinivartayeyuḥ, naivopasaṃkrameyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2713: tatra tathāgataḥ sattvān durbalāśayān viditvā yathā sa deśikastadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmitīte teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārtham,
S04bsu036_u:2714: viśrāntānāṃ caiṣāmevaṃ kathayati - idaṃ khalu ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramiti,
S04bsu036_u:2715_0: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahopāyakauśalyena antarā dve
S04bsu036_u:2715_1: nirvāṇabhūmī sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārthaṃ deśayati saṃprakāśayati yadidaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ
S04bsu036_u:2716: yasmiṃśca bhikṣavaḥ samaye te sattvāstatra sthitā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:2717: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyevaṃ saṃśrāvayati - na khalu punarbhikṣavo yūyaṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2721: api tu khalu punarūpāyakauśalyametad bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat trīṇi yānāni saṃprakāśayantīti //
S04bsu036_u:2722: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayopadarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:2723: Saddhp_7.60 abhijñajñānābhibhu lokanāyako yadbodhimaṇḍasmi niṣaṇṇa āsīt /
S04bsu036_u:2724: daśeha so antarakalpa pūrṇān na lapsi bodhiṃ paramārthadarśī //
S04bsu036_u:2725: Saddhp_7.61 devātha nāgā asurātha guhyakā udyukta pūjārtha jinasya tasya /
S04bsu036_u:2726: puṣpāṇa varṣaṃ pramumocu tatra buddhe ca bodhiṃ naranāyake 'smin //
S04bsu036_u:2727: Saddhp_7.62 upariṃ ca khe dundubhayo vineduḥ satkārapūjārtha jinasya tasya /
S04bsu036_u:2728: suduḥkhitā cāpi jinena tatra cirabudhyamānena anuttaraṃ padam //
S04bsu036_u:2729: Saddhp_7.63 daśāna co antarakalpa atyayāt spṛśe sa bodhiṃ bhagavānanābhibhūḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2730: hṛṣṭā udagrāstada āsu sarve devā manuṣyā bhujagāsurāśca //
S04bsu036_u:2731: vīrāḥ kumārā atha tasya ṣoḍaśa putrā guṇāḍhyā naranāyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2732: Saddhp_7.64 vīrāḥ kumārā atha tasya ṣoḍaśa putrā guṇāḍhyā naranāyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2735: Saddhp_7.65 vanditva pādau ca vināyakasya adhyeṣiṣū dharma prakāśayasva /
S04bsu036_u:2736: asmāṃśca tarpehi imaṃ ca lokaṃ subhāṣiteneha narendrasiṃha //
S04bsu036_u:2737: Saddhp_7.66 cirasya lokasya daśaddiśe 'smin vidito 'si utpannu mahāvināyaka /
S04bsu036_u:2739: Saddhp_7.67 diśāya pūrvāya sahasrakoṭyaḥ kṣetrāṇa pañcāśadabhūṣi kampitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2740: tatrāpi ye brāhma vimāna agrāste tejavanto adhimātramāsi //
S04bsu036_u:2742: puṣpairihābhyokiriyāṇa nāyakamarpenti te sarva vimāna tasya //
S04bsu036_u:2744: tūṣṇīṃ ca so āsi narendrarājā na tāva kālo mama dharma bhāṣitum //
S04bsu036_u:2745: Saddhp_7.70 evaṃ diśi dakṣiṇiyāṃ pi tatra atha paścimā heṣṭima uttarasyām /
S04bsu036_u:2746: upariṣṭimāyāṃ vidiśāsu caiva āgatya brahmāṇa sahasrakoṭyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2747: Saddhp_7.71 puṣpebhi abhyokiriyāṇa nāyakaṃ pādau ca vanditva vināyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2751: Saddhp_7.73 adhyeṣaṇāṃ jñātva anantacakṣuḥ prakāśate dharma bahuprakāram /
S04bsu036_u:2752: catvāri satyāni ca vistareṇa pratītya sarve imi bhāva utthitāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2753: Saddhp_7.74 avidya ādīkariyāṇa cakṣumān prabhāṣate sa maraṇāntaduḥkham /
S04bsu036_u:2754: jātiprasūtā imi sarvadoṣā mṛtyuṃ ca mānuṣyamimeva jānatha //
S04bsu036_u:2755: Saddhp_7.75 samanantaraṃ bhāṣitu dharma tena bahuprakārā vividhā anantāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2756: śrutvānaśītī nayutāna koṭyaḥ sattvāḥ sthitāḥ śrāvaka bhūtale laghum //
S04bsu036_u:2757: Saddhp_7.76 kṣaṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ aparaṃ abhūṣi jinasya tasyo bahu dharma bhāṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2758: viśuddhasattvā yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ kṣaṇena te śrāvakabhūta āsīt //
S04bsu036_u:2759: Saddhp_7.77 tatottarī agaṇiyu tasya āsīt saṃghastadā lokavināyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:2760: kalpāna koṭīnyayutā gaṇenta ekaika no cāntu labheya teṣām //
S04bsu036_u:2761: Saddhp_7.78 ye cāpi te ṣoḍaśa rājaputrā ye aurasā cailakabhūta sarve /
S04bsu036_u:2762: te śrāmaṇerā avaciṃsu taṃ jinaṃ prakāśayā nāyaka agradharmam //
S04bsu036_u:2763: yathā vayaṃ lokavidū bhavema yathaiva tvaṃ sarvajinānamuttama /
S04bsu036_u:2764: Saddhp_7.79 yathā vayaṃ lokavidū bhavema yathaiva tvaṃ sarvajinānamuttama /
S04bsu036_u:2766: ime ca sattvā bhavi sarvi eva yathaiva tvaṃ vīra viśuddhacakṣuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2767: Saddhp_7.80 so cā jino āṃśayu jñātva teṣāṃ kumārabhūtāna tathātmajānām /
S04bsu036_u:2770: bhūtāṃ cariṃ darśayi lokanātho yathā caranto vidu bodhisattvāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:2772: gāthāsahasrehi analpakehi yeṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ //

S04bsu036_u:3347_0: abhyudgamya vaihāyasamantarīkṣe samavātiṣṭhaccitro darśanīyaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpagrahaṇīyavedikāsahasraiḥ
S04bsu036_u:3347_2: ratnadāmasahasrābhiḥ pralambitaḥ paṭṭaghaṇṭāsahasraiḥ pralambitaḥ tamālapatracandanagandhaṃ pramuñcamānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3348: tena ca gandhena sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃmūrcchitābhūt /

S04bsu036_u:3351: tasmiṃśca stūpe trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyairmāndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistaṃ ratnastūpamavakiranti adhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti /
S04bsu036_u:3352: tasmācca ratnastūpādevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune /
S04bsu036_u:3355_0: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaihāyasamantarīkṣe
S04bsu036_u:3355_1: sthitaṃ saṃjātaharṣāḥ prītiprāmodyaprasādaprāptāḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmutthāya āsanebhyo
S04bsu036_u:3356: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpratibhāno nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ kautūhalaprāptaṃ viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3359: ko vā bhagavan asmānmahāratnastūpādevaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati?
S04bsu036_u:3360: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - asmin mahāpratibhāna mahāratnastūpe tathāgatasyātmabhāvastiṣṭhati ekaghanaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3363: asti mahāpratibhāna adhastāyāṃ diśi asaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya ratnaviśuddhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3365: tasyaitadbhagavataḥ purvapraṇidhānamabhūt - ahaṃ khalu pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇo na tāvanniryāto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:3366: yāvanmayāyaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvāvavādo na śruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3367: yadā tu mayā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3369_0: tena khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavatā prabhūtaratnena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
S04bsu036_u:3369_1: parinirvāṇakālasamaye sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:3369_2: prajāyāḥ purastādevamārocitam - mama khalu bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtasya asya tathāgatātmabhāvavigrahasya
S04bsu036_u:3371_0: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitadadhiṣṭhānamabhūt
S04bsu036_u:3371_1: - ayaṃ mama stūpo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvayaṃ [Vaidya_150]
S04bsu036_u:3373: taistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirasmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe parṣanmaṇḍalasyopari vaihāyasaṃ tiṣṭhet /
S04bsu036_u:3374: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇānāmayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ sādhukāraṃ dadyāt /
S04bsu036_u:3377: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau asmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye mayā bhāṣyamāṇe 'smāt parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyādabhyudgamya uparyantarīkṣe vaihāyasaṃ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ dadāti sma //
S04bsu036_u:3378: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paśyāma vayaṃ bhagavan etaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena /
S04bsu036_u:3379_0: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tasya khalu
S04bsu036_u:3380: etadasya praṇidhānam - yadā khalvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanta imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3381: tadāyaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpo 'sya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya gacchet tathāgatānāmantikam /
S04bsu036_u:3382: yadā punaste buddhā bhagavanto mamātmabhāvavigrahamuddhāṭya darśayitukāmā bhaveyuścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām,
S04bsu036_u:3383: atha taistathāgatairdaśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ya ātmabhāvanirmitāstathāgatavigrahā anyānyanāmadheyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3384: teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu036_u:3385: tān sarvān saṃnipātya tairātmabhāvanirmitaistathāgatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ paścādayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ samuddhāṭya upadarśayitavyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām /
S04bsu036_u:3387: ye daśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lokadhātusahasreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:3389: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tānapi tāvad bhagavaṃstathāgatātmabhāvāṃstathāgatanirmitān sarvān vandāmahai //
S04bsu036_u:3391: yayā raśmyā samanantarapramuktayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśatsu gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:3393: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sphaṭikamayāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu036_u:3396: teṣu teṣu buddhā bhagavanto madhureṇa valgunā svareṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu036_u:3397: bodhisattvaśatasahasraiśca paripūrṇāni tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu036_u:3407_0: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu036_u:3407_1: bahuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu036_u:3410: atha khalu te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ svān svān bodhisattvagaṇānāmantrayanti sma - gantavyaṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā bhaviṣyati asmābhiḥ sahāṃ lokadhātum,
S04bsu036_u:3413: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ svaiḥ svairupasthāyakaiḥ sārdhamātmadvitīyā ātmatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3414_0: iti hi tasmin samaye iyaṃ sarvāvatī lokadhātū ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitābhūd vaiḍūryamayī
S04bsu036_u:3416: iti hi tasmin samaye ye 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaḍgatyupapannāḥ sattvāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3418: sthāpayitvā ye tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3419: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavanta upasthāyakadvitīyā upasthāyakatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3420: āgatāgatāśca te tathāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanamupaniśritya viharanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3422: ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam /
S04bsu036_u:3424: anena paryāyeṇa sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaratnavṛkṣamūleṣu tathāgatāḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇā abhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:3425: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3426: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3427: atha khalu punarbhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ tathāgatavigrahāṇāmāgatāgatānāmavakāśaṃ nirmimīte sma /
S04bsu036_u:3430: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca [Vaidya_152] vṛkṣaiścitritam /
S04bsu036_u:3432: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3433: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma /
S04bsu036_u:3434: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham /
S04bsu036_u:3440: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā //
S04bsu036_u:3441: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu,
S04bsu036_u:3443: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3444: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3445: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam /
S04bsu036_u:3446: ratnapuṣpapuṭān datvā evaṃ vadanti sma - gacchata yūyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam /

S04bsu036_u:3447_1: vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3449: evaṃ ca vadadhvam - dadāti khalu punarbhagavāṃstathāgataśchandamasya mahāratnastūpasya samuddhāṭane /
S04bsu036_u:3450: evaṃ te tathāgatāḥ sarve svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayāmāsuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3451: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svānnirmitānaśeṣataḥ samāgatān viditvā,
S04bsu036_u:3456: tāśca sarvāścatasraḥ pariṣadaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo 'ñjalīḥ parigṛhya bhagavato mukhamullokayantyastasthuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3457: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ [Vaidya_153] mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:3458: samuddhāṭya ca dve bhittī pravisārayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:3460: evameva bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭya apāvṛṇoti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3462: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddvā pariśuṣkagātraḥ saṃghaṭitakāyo yathā samādhisamāpannastathā saṃdṛśyate sma /

S04bsu036_u:3467_0: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3468_0: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha

S04bsu036_u:3469: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasminneva siṃhāsane 'rdhāsanamadāsīt,
S04bsu036_u:3471: evaṃ ca vadati - ihaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato niṣīdatu /

S04bsu036_u:3473: ubhau ca tau tathāgatau tasya mahāratnastūpasya madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭau vaihāyasamantarīkṣasthau saṃdṛśyete //
S04bsu036_u:3474: atha khalu tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmetadabhavat - dūrasthā vayamābhyāṃ tathāgatābhyām /
S04bsu036_u:3476_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S04bsu036_u:3476_1: tasyāṃ velāyāmṛddhibalena tāścatasraḥ parṣado vaihāyasamuparyantarīkṣe pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:3477_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣada āmantrayate
S04bsu036_u:3477_1: sma - ko bhikṣavo yuṣmākamutsahate tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3478: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ, ayaṃ sa samayaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3481: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:3482: Saddhp_11.1 ayamāgato nirvṛtako maharṣī ratanāmayaṃ stūpa praviśya nāyakaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:3489: te dharmakṛtyasya kṛtena āgatāḥ parinirvṛtaṃ ca imu draṣṭu nātham //
