S04bsu036_u:3499: Saddhp_11.9 gandho manojño daśasū diśāsu pravāyate lokavināyakānām /
S04bsu036_u:3501: yenā ime mūrcchita sarvasattvā vāte pravāte iha nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:3502: Saddhp_11.10 mayi nirvṛte yo etaṃ dharmaparyāyu dhārayet /
S04bsu036_u:3504: Saddhp_11.11 parinirvṛto hi saṃbuddhaḥ prabhūtaratano muniḥ /

S04bsu036_u:3512: Saddhp_11.15 ahaṃ ca dṛṣṭo iha āsanasmin bhagavāṃśca yo 'yaṃ sthitu stūpamadhye /

S04bsu036_u:3941: etanmamo sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //
S04bsu036_u:3942: Saddhp_13.36 yaścāpi bhikṣū mama nirvṛtasya anīrṣuko eta prakāśayeyā /
S04bsu036_u:3943: na tasya duḥkhaṃ na ca antarāyo śokopayāsā na bhavetkadācit //
S04bsu036_u:3944: Saddhp_13.37 na tasya saṃtrāsana kaści kuryānna tāḍanāṃ nāpi avarṇa bhāṣet /
S04bsu036_u:3945: na cāpi nipkāsana jātu tasya tathā hi so kṣāntibale pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3946: Saddhp_13.38 sukhasthitasyo tada paṇḍitasya evaṃ sthitasyo yatha bhāṣitaṃ mayā /
S04bsu036_u:3947: guṇāna koṭīśata bhontyaneke na śakyate kalpaśate hi vaktum //
S04bsu036_u:3948_1: vartamāne idaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nīrṣuko bhavatyaśaṭho 'māyāvī,
S04bsu036_u:3951_0: na cānyeṣāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:3951_1: vā bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ vā kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati - dūre yūyaṃ kulaputrā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3961: ye ca daśasu dikṣu loke bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ, tānabhīkṣṇamadhyāśayena gauraveṇa ca namaskurute /
S04bsu036_u:3962: dharmaṃ ca deśayamāno 'nūnamanadhikaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati samena dharmapremṇā,
S04bsu036_u:3963: na ca kasyacidantaśo dharmapremṇāpyadhikataramanugrahaṃ karoti imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3964_0: anena mañjuśrīstṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya
S04bsu036_u:3964_1: parinirvṛtasya saddharmaparikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ
S04bsu036_u:3970: pustakagataṃ ca kṛtvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti //
S04bsu036_u:3971: idamavocad bhagavān / idaṃ vaditvā sugato hyathāparametaduvāca śāstā -
S04bsu036_u:3972: Saddhp_13.39 śāṭhyaṃ ca mānaṃ tatha kūṭanāṃ ca aśeṣato ujjhiya dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3973: īrṣyāṃ na kuryāttatha jātu paṇḍito ya icchate sūtramidaṃ prakāśitum //
S04bsu036_u:3974: Saddhp_13.40 avarṇa jātū na vadeya kasyaciddṛṣṭīvivādaṃ ca na jātu kuryāt /
S04bsu036_u:3975: kaukṛtyasthānaṃ ca na jātu kuryānna lapsyase jñānamanuttara tvam //
S04bsu036_u:3976: Saddhp_13.41 sadā ca so ārjavu mardāvaśca kṣāntaśca bhotī sugatasya putraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3977: dharmaṃ prakāśetuḥ punaḥ punaścimaṃ na tasya khedo bhavatī kadācit //
S04bsu036_u:3978: Saddhp_13.42 ye bodhisattvā daśasū diśāsu sattvānukampāya caranti loke /
S04bsu036_u:3979: te sarvi śāstāra bhavanti mahyaṃ gurugauravaṃ teṣu janeta paṇḍitaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3980: Saddhp_13.43 smaritva buddhāna dvipadānamuttamān jineṣu nityaṃ pitṛsaṃjña kuryāt /
S04bsu036_u:3981: adhimānasaṃjñāṃ ca vihāya sarvāṃ na tasya bhotī tada antarāyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3982: Saddhp_13.44 śruṇitva dharmaṃ imamevarūpaṃ sa rakṣitavyastada paṇḍitena /
S04bsu036_u:3983: sukhaṃ vihārāya samāhitaśca surakṣito bhoti ca prāṇikoṭibhiḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3984_1: vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitukāmastena bhikṣuṇā gṛhasthapravrajitānāmantikād
S04bsu036_u:3986: ye ca sattvā bodhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmantike spṛhotpādayitavyā /
S04bsu036_u:3989: ye tathāgatasyopāyakauśalyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ na śṛṇvanti na jānanti na budhyante na pṛcchanti na śraddadhanti nādhimucyante /
S04bsu036_u:3992: api tu khalu punarahametāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yo yasmin sthito bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:3993: taṃ tasminneva ṛddhibalenāvarjayiṣyāmi pattīyāpayiṣyāmi avatārayiṣyāmi paripācayiṣyāmi //
S04bsu036_u:3994: anenāpi mañjuśrīścaturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamāno 'vyābādho bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:3995: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ rājñā rajaputrāṇāṃ rājāmātyānāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ naigamajānapadānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām /
S04bsu036_u:3996: antarīkṣāvacarāścāsya devatāḥ śrāddhāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhā bhaviṣyanti dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu036_u:3997: devaputrāścāsya sadānubaddhā bhaviṣyantyārakṣāyai grāmagatasya vā vihāragatasya vā /
S04bsu036_u:3999: tasya ca vyākaraṇenaṃ tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4002: durlabho 'sya mañjuśrīrdharmaparyāyasya bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu śabdo vā ghoṣo vā nāmaśravo vā //
S04bsu036_u:4003: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrī rājā bhavati balacakravartī, balena taṃ svakaṃ rājyaṃ nirjināti /
S04bsu036_u:4004: tato 'sya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratirājānastena sārdhaṃ vigrahamāpannā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:4005: atha tasya rājño balacakravartino vividhā yodhā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:4007: atha sa rājā tān yodhān yudhyamānān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ prīto bhavatyāttamanaskaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4008: sa prīta āttamanāḥ samānasteṣāṃ yodhānāṃ vividhāni dānāni dadāti /
S04bsu036_u:4009: tadyathā grāmaṃ vā grāmakṣetrāṇi [Vaidya_174] vā dadāti,
S04bsu036_u:4012: veṣṭanāni hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni karṇābharaṇāni sauvarṇasūtrāṇi hārārdhahārāṇi hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālānyapi dadāti,
S04bsu036_u:4016: tatkasya hetoḥ? eka eva hi sa cūḍāmaṇī rājño mūrdhasthāyī /
S04bsu036_u:4017: yadā punarmañjuśrī rājā tamapi cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti,
S04bsu036_u:4018: tadā sa sarvo rājñaścaturaṅgabalakāya āścaryaprāpto bhavatyadbhutaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4019: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā svena bāhubalanirjitena puṇyabalanirjitena traidhātuke dharmeṇa dharmarājyaṃ kārayati /
S04bsu036_u:4021: atha khalu tathāgatasyāpi āryā yodhā māreṇa sārdhaṃ yudhyante /
S04bsu036_u:4022_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīstathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā teṣāmāryāṇāṃ
S04bsu036_u:4022_1: yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā vividhāni sūtraśatasahasrāṇi bhāṣate sma catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣaṇārtham /
S04bsu036_u:4026_0: tatra mañjuśrīryathā sa rājā balacakravartī teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ mahatā puruṣakāreṇa
S04bsu036_u:4026_1: vismāpitaḥ samānaḥ paścāttaṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ paścimaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti sarvalokāśraddheyaṃ vismayabhūtam /
S04bsu036_u:4027: yathā mañjuśrīstasya rājñaḥ sa cūḍāmaṇiścirarakṣito mūrdhasthāyī,
S04bsu036_u:4028: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastraidhātuke dharmarājo dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayamāṇo yasmin samaye
S04bsu036_u:4029: paśyati śrāvakāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca skandhamāreṇa vā kleśamāreṇa vā sārdhaṃ yudhyamānān,
S04bsu036_u:4030: taiśca sārdhaṃ yudhyamānairyadā rāgadveṣamohakṣayaḥ sarvatraidhātukānniḥsaraṇaṃ sarvamāranirghātanaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraḥ kṛto bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:4032: sarveṣḥṃ sarvajñatḥhḥrakaṃ mahḥcūḍḥmaṇiprakhyaṃ tathḥgataḥ śrḥvakebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu036_u:4033: eṣḥ hi mañjuśrīstathḥgatḥnḥṃ paramḥ dharmadeśanḥ, ayaṃ paścimastathḥgatḥnḥṃ dharmaparyḥyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4035: yo 'yaṃ mañjuśrīstathḥgatena adya tenaiva rḥjñḥ balacakravartinḥ ciraparirakṣitaścūḍḥmaṇiravamucya yodhebhyo dattaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4036: evameva mañjuśrīstathḥgato 'pīmaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ cirḥnurakṣitaṃ sarvadharmaparyḥyḥṇḥṃ mūrdhasthḥyi tathḥgatavijñeyam /
S04bsu036_u:4038: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4039: Saddhp_13.45 maitrībalaṃ co sada darśayantaḥ kṛpāyamāṇaḥ sada sarvasattvān /
S04bsu036_u:4041: Saddhp_13.46 gṛhastha ye pravrajitāśca ye syuratha bodhisattvāstada kāli paścime /
S04bsu036_u:4042: sarveṣu maitrībala so hi darśayī mā haiva kṣepsyanti śruṇitva dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:4043: Saddhp_13.47 ahaṃ tu bodhimanuprāpuṇitvā yadā sthito bheṣyi tathāgatatve /
S04bsu036_u:4044: tato upāneṣyi upāyi sthitvā saṃśrāvayiṣye imamagrabodhim //
S04bsu036_u:4045: Saddhp_13.48 yathāpi rājā balacakravartī yodhāna dadyādvividhaṃ hiraṇyam /
S04bsu036_u:4046: hastīṃśca aśvāṃśca rathān padātīn nagarāṇi grāmāṃśca dadāti tuṣṭaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4047: Saddhp_13.49 keṣāṃci hastābharaṇāni prīto dadāti rūpyaṃ ca suvarṇasūtram /
S04bsu036_u:4048: muktāmaṇiṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ vividhāṃśca dāsān sa dadāti prītaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4049: Saddhp_13.50 yadā tu so uttamasāṃhasena vismāpito kenaci tatra bhoti /
S04bsu036_u:4050: vijñāya āścaryamidaṃ kṛtaṃ ti mukuṭaṃ sa muñcitva maṇiṃ dadāti //
S04bsu036_u:4051: Saddhp_13.51 tathaiva buddho ahu dharmarājā kṣāntībalaḥ prajñaprabhūtakośaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4053: Saddhp_13.52 sattvāṃśca dṛṣṭvātha vihanyamānān bhāṣāmi sūtrāntasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4054: parākramaṃ jāniya teṣa prāṇināṃ ye śuddhasattvā iha kleśaghātinaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4056: Saddhp_13.53 atha dharmarājāpi mahābhiṣaṭkaḥ paryāyakoṭīśata bhāṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4058: jñātvā ca sattvān balavantu jñānī cūḍāmaṇiṃ vā ima sūtra deśayī //
S04bsu036_u:4059: Saddhp_13.54 imu paścimu loki vadāmi sūtraṃ sūtrāṇa sarveṣa mamāgrabhūtam /
S04bsu036_u:4060: saṃrakṣitaṃ me na ca jātu proktaṃ taṃ śrāvayāmyadya śṛṇotha sarve //
S04bsu036_u:4061: Saddhp_13.55 catvāri dharmā imi evarūpāḥ mayi nirvṛte ye ca niṣevitavyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4062: ye cārthikā uttamamagrabodhau vyāpāraṇaṃ ye ca karonti mahyam //
S04bsu036_u:4063: Saddhp_13.56 na tasya śoko na pi cāntarāyo daurvarṇikaṃ nāpi gilānakatvam /
S04bsu036_u:4064: na ca cchavī kṛṣṇika tasya bhoti na cāpi hīne nagarasmi vāsaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4065: Saddhp_13.57 priyadarśano 'sau satataṃ maharṣī tathāgato vā yatha pūjya bhoti /
S04bsu036_u:4066: upasthāyakāstasya bhavanti nityaṃ ye devaputrā daharā bhavanti //
S04bsu036_u:4067: Saddhp_13.58 na tasya śastraṃ na viṣaṃ kadācit kāye krame nāpi ca daṇḍaloṣṭam /
S04bsu036_u:4068: saṃmīlitaṃ tasya mukhaṃ bhaveya yo tasya ākrośamapī vadeyā //
S04bsu036_u:4069: Saddhp_13.59 so bandhubhūto bhavatīha prāṇināmālokajāto vicarantu medinīm /
S04bsu036_u:4070: timiraṃ haranto bahuprāṇakoṭināṃ yo sūtradhāre imu nirvṛte mayi //
S04bsu036_u:4071: Saddhp_13.60 supinasmi so paśyati bhadrarūpaṃ bhikṣūṃśca so paśyati bhikṣuṇīśca /
S04bsu036_u:4072: sihāsanasthaṃ ca tathātmabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ prakāśentu bahuprakāram //
S04bsu036_u:4073: Saddhp_13.61 devāṃśca yakṣān yatha gaṅgāvālikā asurāṃśca nāgāṃśca bahuprakārān /
S04bsu036_u:4074: teṣāṃ ca so bhāṣati agradharmaṃ supinasmi sarveṣa kṛtāñjalīnām //
S04bsu036_u:4075: Saddhp_13.62 tathāgataṃ so supinasmi paśyati deśenta dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭinām /
S04bsu036_u:4077: Saddhp_13.63 so cā tahī bhoti kṛtāñjalisthito abhiṣṭuvanto dvipaduttamaṃ munim /
S04bsu036_u:4078: so cā jino bhāṣati agradharmaṃ caturṇa parṣāṇa mahābhiṣaṭūkaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4079: Saddhp_13.64 so ca prahṛṣṭo bhavatī śruṇitvā prāmodyajātaśca karoti pūjām /
S04bsu036_u:4080: supine ca so dhāraṇi prāpuṇoti avivartiyaṃ jñāna spṛśitva kṣipram //
S04bsu036_u:4081: Saddhp_13.65 jñātvā ca so āśayu lokanāthastaṃ vyākarotī puruṣarṣabhatve /
S04bsu036_u:4082: kulaputra tvaṃ pīha anuttaraṃ śivaṃ spṛśiṣyasi jñānamanāgate 'dhvani //
S04bsu036_u:4083: Saddhp_13.66 tavāpi kṣetraṃ vipulaṃ bhaviṣyati parṣāśca catvāri yathaiva mahyam /
S04bsu036_u:4084: śroṣyanti dharmaṃ vipulaṃ anāsravaṃ sagauravā bhūtva kṛtāñjalī ca //
S04bsu036_u:4085: Saddhp_13.67 punaśca so paśyati ātmabhāvaṃ bhāventa dharmaṃ girikandareṣu /
S04bsu036_u:4086: bhāvitva dharmaṃ ca spṛśitva dharmatāṃ samādhi so labdhu jinaṃ ca paśyati //
S04bsu036_u:4087: suvarṇavarṇaṃ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇaṃ supinasmi dṛṣṭvā ca śṛṇoti dharmam /
S04bsu036_u:4088: Saddhp_13.68 suvarṇavarṇaṃ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇaṃ supinasmi dṛṣṭvā ca śṛṇoti dharmam /
S04bsu036_u:4090: śrutvā ca taṃ parṣadi saṃprakāśayī supino khu tasyo ayamevarūpaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4091: Saddhp_13.69 svapne 'pi sarvaṃ prajahitva rājyamantaḥpuraṃ jñātigaṇaṃ tathaiva /
S04bsu036_u:4092: abhiniṣkramī sarva jahitva kāmānupasaṃkramī yena ca bodhimaṇḍam //
S04bsu036_u:4093: Saddhp_13.70 siṃhāsane tatra niṣīdiyāno drumasya mūle tahi bodhiarthikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4094: divasāna saptāna tathātyayena anuprāpsyate jñānu tathāgatānām //
S04bsu036_u:4095: Saddhp_13.71 bodhiṃ ca prāptastatu vyutthahitvā pravartayī cakramanāsravaṃ hi /
S04bsu036_u:4096: caturṇa parṣāṇa sa dharma deśayī acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4097: Saddhp_13.72 prakāśayitvā tahi dharma nāsravaṃ nirvāpayitvā bahu prāṇikoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4098: nirvāyatī hetukṣaye va dīpaḥ supino ayaṃ so bhavatevarūpaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4099: Saddhp_13.73 bahu ānuśaṃsāśca anantakāśca ye mañjughoṣā sada tasya bhonti /
S04bsu036_u:4100: yo paścime kāli iamamagradharmaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeya mayā sudeśitam //
S04bsu036_u:4105: atha khalu anyalokadhātvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmaṣṭau gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasmin samaye tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalādabhyutthitā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:4106: te 'ñjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavato 'bhimukhā bhagavantaṃ namasyamānā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - saced bhagavānasmākamanujānīyāt,
S04bsu036_u:4107: vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau saṃprakāśeyama vācayema lekhayema pūjayema,
S04bsu036_u:4110: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānetadavocat - alaṃ kulaputrāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4112: santi kulaputrā iha mamaivāsyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi ekasya bodhisattvasya parivāraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4113: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ ṣaṣṭyeva gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:4114: yeṣāmekaikasya bodhisattvasya iyāneva parivāraḥ ye mama parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti saṃprakāśayiṣyanti //
S04bsu036_u:4115: samanantarabhāṣitā ceyaṃ bhagavatā vāk, atheyaṃ sahā lokadhātuḥ samantāt sphuṭitā visphuṭitā abhūt /

S04bsu036_u:4344: Saddhp_14.47 kathaṃ imaṃ adbhutamīdṛśaṃ te taṃ śraddadhiṣyantimi bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4345: vicikitsanirghātanahetu bhāṣa taṃ tvaṃ caiva deśehi yathaiva arthaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4346: Saddhp_14.48 yathā hi puruṣo iha kaścideva daharo bhaveyā śiśu kṛṣṇakeśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4347: jātyā ca so viṃśatiruttare vā darśeti putrān śatavarṣajātān //
S04bsu036_u:4348: Saddhp_14.49 valīhi palitehi ca te upetā eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4349: duḥśraddadhaṃ tadbhavi lokanātha daharasya putrā imi evarūpāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4350: Saddhp_14.50 emeva bhagavāṃśca navo vayasthaḥ ime ca vijñā bahubodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4352: Saddhp_14.51 dhṛtimanta prajñāya vicakṣaṇāśca prāsādikā darśaniyāśca sarve /
S04bsu036_u:4354: Saddhp_14.52 asaṅgacārī pavaneva santi ākāśadhātau satataṃ aniśritāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4355: jānenti vīryaṃ sugatasya putrāḥ paryeṣamāṇā ima buddhabhūmim //
S04bsu036_u:4356: Saddhp_14.53 kathaṃ nu śraddheyamidaṃ bhaveyā parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin /
S04bsu036_u:4357: vicikitsa asmāka na kācidasti śṛṇomathā saṃmukha lokanāthā //
S04bsu036_u:4358: Saddhp_14.54 vicikitsa kṛtvāna imasmi sthāne gaccheyu mā durgati bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4359: tvaṃ vyākuruṣvā bhagavan yathāvat katha bodhisattvāḥ paripācitā ime //
S04bsu036_u:4364: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4366: dvitīyakamapi bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4368: tṛtīyakamapi bhagavāṃstan bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4370_0: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ
S04bsu036_u:4370_1: sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham, bhāṣatu sugataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4372: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham, bhāṣatu sugataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4374: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham, bhāṣatu sugataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4376: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - tena hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ mamādhiṣṭhānabalādhānam,
S04bsu036_u:4377_0: yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte - sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā
S04bsu036_u:4379: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya /
S04bsu036_u:4380: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4382: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:4383: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāṃllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:4384: sarvāṇi ca tāni pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:4385: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā?
S04bsu036_u:4386: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśirbhagavantametadavocat - asaṃkhyeyāste bhagavaṃllokadhātavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4388: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:4389: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate /
S04bsu036_u:4392: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat - ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4394: yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni,
S04bsu036_u:4396: sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
S04bsu036_u:4398: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu036_u:4400: ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā dīpaṃkaratathāgataprabhṛtayaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4404: tathāgata āgatāgatānāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryavaimātratāṃ vyavalokya tasmiṃstasminnātmano nāma vyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:4406: tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4407: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati - daharo 'hamasmi bhikṣavo jātyābhiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4410: tathāgata evaṃ cirābhisaṃbuddha evaṃ vyāharati - acirābhisaṃbuddho 'hamasmīti,
S04bsu036_u:4413: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4414: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā,
S04bsu036_u:4415: ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati,
S04bsu036_u:4418: tatkasya hetoḥ? dṛṣṭaṃ hi tathāgatena traidhātukaṃ yathābhūtam /
S04bsu036_u:4419: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti,
S04bsu036_u:4420: na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā /
S04bsu036_u:4421: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4423: tatra tathāgato yāṃ kāṃcidvācaṃ vyāharati, sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ na mṛṣā nānyathā /
S04bsu036_u:4424: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:4428: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā /
S04bsu036_u:4430: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt /
S04bsu036_u:4431: idānīṃ [Vaidya_191] khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi /
S04bsu036_u:4433_0: sattvānahaṃ kulaputrā anena paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi - mā haiva me 'ticiraṃ tiṣṭhato
S04bsu036_u:4433_2: andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4434: na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ - āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti /
S04bsu036_u:4435: vīryaṃ nārabheyustraidhātukānniḥsaraṇārtham, na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4436: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma /
S04bsu036_u:4437: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:4439: tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi - durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti /
S04bsu036_u:4440: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:4442: apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya /
S04bsu036_u:4443: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4444: etamarthaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'parinirvāyanneva parinirvāṇamārocayati sattvānāṃ vaineyavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu036_u:4447: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:4448: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:4449: sa ca vaidyaḥ pravāsagato bhavet, te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā viṣapīḍā vā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4450: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4451: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4452: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet /
S04bsu036_u:4453: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4455: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4456: evaṃ cainaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭyāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4459: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ pariveṣṭamānān,
S04bsu036_u:4460: tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca,
S04bsu036_u:4461: śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:4462: evaṃ cainān vadet - pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam /
S04bsu036_u:4463: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
S04bsu036_u:4465: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4466: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4467: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4468: enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti /
S04bsu036_u:4469: [Vaidya_192] te caivaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeran, tacca bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ na pibeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4471: tathā hi teṣāṃ tayā viparītasaṃjñyā tad bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ varṇenāpi na rocate,
S04bsu036_u:4473: atha khalu sa vaidyapuruṣa evaṃ cintayet - ime mama putrā anena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4477: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānupāyakauśalyena tadbhaiṣajyaṃ pāyayitukāma evaṃ vadet - jīrṇo 'hamasmi kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4480: mā ca yūyaṃ putrāḥ śociṣṭha, mā ca klamamāpadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:4483: sa evaṃ tān putrānupāyakauśalyena anuśiṣya anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4484: tatra gatvā kālagatamātmānaṃ yeṣāṃ glānānāṃ putrāṇāmārocayet,
S04bsu036_u:4486: atīva parideveyuḥ - yo hyasmākaṃ pitā nātho janako 'nukampakaḥ so 'pi nāmaikaḥ kālagataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4488: te khalvanāthabhūtamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'śaraṇamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'bhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4489: teṣāṃ ca tayābhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtatayā sā viparītasaṃjñā aviparītasaṃjñā bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:4490: yacca tad bhaiṣajyaṃ varṇagandharasopetaṃ tadvarṇagandharasopetameva saṃjānīyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4493: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānābādhavimuktān viditvā punarevātmānamupadarśayet /
S04bsu036_u:4494: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrā mā haiva tasya vaidyasya tadupāyakauśalyaṃ kurvataḥ kaścinmṛṣāvādena saṃcodayet?
S04bsu036_u:4495: āhuḥ - no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata /
S04bsu036_u:4497: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ ahamantarāntaramevaṃrūpāṇyupāyakauśalyāni sattvānāmupadarśayāmi vinayārtham /
S04bsu036_u:4498: na ca me kaścidatra sthāne mṛṣāvādo bhavati //
S04bsu036_u:4499: atha khalu bhagavānimāmeva arthagatiṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4500: Saddhp_15.1 acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyo yāsāṃ pramāṇaṃ na kadāci vidyate /
S04bsu036_u:4501: prāptā mayā eṣa tadāgrabodhirdharmaṃ ca deśemyahu nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:4502: Saddhp_15.2 samādapemī bahubodhisattvān bauddhasmi jñānasmi sthapemi caiva /
S04bsu036_u:4504: Saddhp_15.3 nirvāṇabhūmiṃ cupadarśayāmi vinayārtha sattvāna vadāmyupāyam /
S04bsu036_u:4505: na cāpi nirvāmyahu tasmi kāle ihaiva co dharmu prakāśayāmi //
S04bsu036_u:4506: Saddhp_15.4 tatrāpi cātmānamadhiṣṭhahāmi sarvāṃśca sattvāna tathaiva cāham /
S04bsu036_u:4507: viparītabuddhī ca narā vimūḍhāḥ tatraiva tiṣṭhantu na paśyiṣū mām //
S04bsu036_u:4508: Saddhp_15.5 parinirvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭva mamātmabhāvaṃ dhātūṣu pūjāṃ vividhāṃ karonti /
S04bsu036_u:4509: māṃ cā apaśyanti janenti tṛṣṇāṃ tatorjukaṃ citta prabhoti teṣām //
S04bsu036_u:4510: Saddhp_15.6 ṛjū yadā te mṛdumārdavāśca utsṛṣṭakāmāśca bhavanti sattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4511: tato ahaṃ śrāvakasaṃgha kṛtvāḥ ātmāna darśemyahu gṛdhrakūṭe //
S04bsu036_u:4512: Saddhp_15.7 evaṃ ca haṃ teṣa vadāmi paścāt ihaiva nāhaṃ tada āsi nirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4513: upāyakauśalya mameti bhikṣavaḥ punaḥ puno bhomyahu jīvaloke //
S04bsu036_u:4514: Saddhp_15.8 anyehi sattvehi puraskṛto 'haṃ teṣāṃ prakāśemi mamāgrabodhim /
S04bsu036_u:4515: yūyaṃ ca śabdaṃ na śṛṇotha mahyaṃ anyatra so nirvṛtu lokanāthaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:4516: Saddhp_15.9 paśyāmyahaṃ sattva vihanyamānān na cāhu darśemi tadātmabhāvam /
S04bsu036_u:4517: spṛhentu tāvanmama darśanasya tṛṣitāna saddharmu prakāśayiṣye //
S04bsu036_u:4519: Saddhp_15.10 sadādhiṣṭhānaṃ mama etadīdṛśaṃ acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4521: na ca cyavāmī itu gṛdhrakūṭāt anyāsu śayyāsanakoṭibhiśca //
S04bsu036_u:4522: Saddhp_15.11 yadāpi sattvā ima lokadhātuṃ paśyanti kalpenti ca dahyamānam /
S04bsu036_u:4523: tadāpi cedaṃ mama buddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇa bhotī marumānuṣāṇām //
S04bsu036_u:4524: Saddhp_15.12 krīḍā ratī teṣa vicitra bhoti udyānaprāsādavimānakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4526: Saddhp_15.13 upariṃ ca devābhihananti tūryān mandāravarṣaṃ ca visarjayanti /
S04bsu036_u:4527: mamaṃ ca abhyokiri śrāvakāṃśca ye cānya bodhāviha prasthitā vidū //
S04bsu036_u:4528: Saddhp_15.14 evaṃ ca me kṣetramidaṃ sadā sthitaṃ anye ca kalpentimu dahyamānam /
S04bsu036_u:4530: Saddhp_15.15 na cāpi me nāma śṛṇonti jātu tathāgatānāṃ bahukalpakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4531: dharmasya vā mahya gaṇasya cāpi pāpasya karmasya phalevarūpam //
S04bsu036_u:4532: Saddhp_15.16 lyadā tu sattvā mṛdu mārdavāśca utpanna bhontīha manuṣyaloke /
S04bsu036_u:4533: utpannamātrāśca śubhena karmaṇā paśyanti māṃ dharmu prakāśayantam //
S04bsu036_u:4534: Saddhp_15.17 na cāhu bhāṣāmi kadāci teṣāṃ imāṃ kriyāmīdṛśikīmanuttarām /
S04bsu036_u:4535: teno ahaṃ dṛṣṭa cirasya bhomi tato 'sya bhāṣāmi sudurlabhā jināḥ //

S04bsu036_u:4678: idaṃ ca me buddhakṣetraṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryamayīṃ samaprastarāṃ drakṣyati suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadavinaddhāṃ ratnavṛkṣairvicitritām /

S04bsu036_u:4681: api tu khalu punarajita tānapyahamadhyāśayādhimuktān kulaputrān vadāmi,

S04bsu036_u:4693: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ mama parinirvṛtasya dhārayitvā vācayitvā likhitvā [Vaidya_202] prakāśayitvā vihārā api tena ajita kṛtā bhavanti vipulā vistīrṇāḥ /

S04bsu036_u:4700: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayan dānena vā saṃpādayecchīlena vā kṣāntyā vā vīryeṇa vā dhyānena
S04bsu036_u:4702: bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparyantam /

S04bsu036_u:4946: Saddhp_18.11 ye parvateṣveva guhānivāsī kalaviṅkakā kokila barhiṇaśca /

S04bsu036_u:4959: Saddhp_18.17 ye bodhisattvāściha lokadhātau svādhyāya kurvanti paraspareṇa /

S04bsu036_u:4961: Saddhp_18.18 bhagavān pi buddho naradamyasārathiḥ parṣāsu dharmaṃ bruvate yamagram /

S04bsu036_u:4969_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:4969_1: dhārayataḥ prakāśayataḥ svādhyāyato likhato 'ṣṭābhirguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:4970: sa tena pariśuddhena ghrāṇendriyeṇa ye trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sāntarbahirvividhagandhāḥ saṃvidyante,
S04bsu036_u:4971: tadyathā - pūtigandhā vā manojñagandhā vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ sumanasāṃ gandhāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4979: sattvānāmapi vividhān gandhān ghrāyati, tadyathā - hastyaśvagaveḍakapaśugandhān ghrāyati /
S04bsu036_u:4984: bhūtān gandhān vandati, na ca tairgandhaiḥ saṃhriyate, na saṃmuhyati /
S04bsu036_u:4985: sa ihasthita eva devānāmapi gandhān ghrāyati,
S04bsu036_u:4986: tadyathā - pārijātakasya kovidārasya māndāravamahāmāndāravamañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakānāṃ divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati /
S04bsu036_u:4988: divyānāṃ ca nānāvidhānāṃ puṣpavikṛtiśatasahasrāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati, nāmāni caiṣāṃ saṃjānīte /
S04bsu036_u:4989: devaputrātmabhāvagandhān ghrāyati, tadyathā - śakrasya devānāmindrasya ātmabhāvagandhaṃ ghrāyati /
S04bsu036_u:4990_0: taṃ ca jānīte yadi vā vaijayante prāsāde krīḍantaṃ ramantaṃ paricārayantaṃ yadi vā
S04bsu036_u:4990_1: sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ yadi vā udyānabhūmau
S04bsu036_u:4996: anena paryāyeṇa yāvad bhavāgropapannānāmapi sattvānāmātmabhāvagandhān ghrāyati /
S04bsu036_u:5001: yasmiṃśca sthāne te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā viharanti, tacca prajānāti /

S04bsu036_u:5006: Saddhp_18.22 ghrāṇendriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti vividhāṃśca gandhān bahu ghrāyate 'sau /
S04bsu036_u:5007: ye lokadhātau hi imasmi sarve sugandha durgandha bhavanti kecit //
S04bsu036_u:5008: Saddhp_18.23 jātīya gandho atha mallikāyā tamālapatrasya ca candanasya /
S04bsu036_u:5009: tagarasya gandho agarusya cāpi vividhāna puṣpāṇa phalāna cāpi //
S04bsu036_u:5010: Saddhp_18.24 sattvāna gandhān pi tathaiva jānati narāṇa nārīṇa ca dūrataḥ sthitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5011: kumārakāṇāṃ ca kumārikāṇāṃ gandhena so jānati teṣa sthānam //
S04bsu036_u:5012: Saddhp_18.25 rājñāṃ pi so jānati cakravartināṃ balacakravartīnatha maṇḍalīnām /
S04bsu036_u:5013: kumārakāmātya tathaiva teṣāṃ gandhena cāntaḥpura sarva jānati //
S04bsu036_u:5014: Saddhp_18.26 paribhogaratnāni bahūvidhāni kupyāni bhūmau nihitāni yāni /
S04bsu036_u:5015: strīratnabhūtāni bhavanti yāpi gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5016: Saddhp_18.27 teṣāṃ ca yā ābharaṇā bhavanti kāyasmi āmukta vicitrarūpā /
S04bsu036_u:5017: vastraṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5018: Saddhp_18.28 sthitāṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ śayitāṃ tathaiva krīḍāratiṃ ṛddhibalaṃ ca sarvam /
S04bsu036_u:5019: so jānatī ghrāṇabalena dhīro yo dhārayet sūtramidaṃ variṣṭham //
S04bsu036_u:5020: Saddhp_18.29 sugandhatailāna tathaiva gandhān nānāvidhān puṣpaphalāna gandhān /
S04bsu036_u:5021: sakṛtasthito jānati ghrāyate ca amukasmi deśasmi imasmi gandhān //
S04bsu036_u:5022: Saddhp_18.30 ye parvatānāṃ vivarāntareṣu bahu candanā puṣpita tatra santi /
S04bsu036_u:5023: ye cāpi tasminnivasanti sattvāḥ sarveṣa gandhena vidurvijānati //
S04bsu036_u:5024: Saddhp_18.31 ye cakravālasya bhavanti pārśve ye sāgarasyo nivasanti madhye /
S04bsu036_u:5025: pṛthivīya ye madhyi vasanti sattvāḥ sarvān sa gandhena vidurvijānati //
S04bsu036_u:5026: Saddhp_18.32 surāṃśca jānāti tathāsurāṃśca asurāṇa kanyāśca vijānate 'sau /
S04bsu036_u:5027: asurāṇa krīḍāśca ratiṃ ca jānati ghrāṇasya tasyedṛśakaṃ balaṃ hi //
S04bsu036_u:5028: Saddhp_18.33 aṭavīṣu ye keci catuṣpadāsti siṃhāśca vyāghrāstatha hastināgāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5029: mahiṣā gavā ye gavayaśca tatra ghrāṇena so jānati teṣa vāsam //
S04bsu036_u:5030: Saddhp_18.34 striyaśca yā gurviṇikā bhavanti kumārakāṃ vāpi kumārikāṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:5031: dhārenti kukṣau hi kilāntakāyā gandhena so jānati yaṃ tahiṃ syāt //
S04bsu036_u:5032: Saddhp_18.35 āpannasattvāṃ pi vijānate 'sau vināśadharmāṃ pi vijānate 'sau /
S04bsu036_u:5033: iyaṃ pi nārī vyapanītaduḥkhā prasaviṣyate puṇyamayaṃ kumāram //
S04bsu036_u:5034: Saddhp_18.36 puruṣāṇa abhiprāyu bahuṃ vijānate abhiprāyagandhaṃ ca tathaiva ghrāyate /
S04bsu036_u:5035: raktāna duṣṭāna tathaiva mrakṣiṇāṃ upaśāntacittāna ca gandha ghrāyate //
S04bsu036_u:5036: Saddhp_18.37 pṛthivīya ye cāpi nidhāna santi ghanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyam /
S04bsu036_u:5037: mañjūṣa lohī ca tathā supūrṇā gandhena so ghrāyati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5038: Saddhp_18.38 hārārdhahārān maṇimuktikāśca anarghaprāptā vividhā ca ratnā /
S04bsu036_u:5039: gandhena so jānati tāni sarvā anarghanāmaṃ dyutisaṃsthitaṃ ca //
S04bsu036_u:5040: Saddhp_18.39 upariṃ ca deveṣu tathaiva puṣpā mandāravāṃścaiva mañjūṣakāṃśca /
S04bsu036_u:5041: yā pārijātasya ca santi puṣpā iha sthito ghrāyati tā sa dhīraḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5042: Saddhp_18.40 vimāna ye yādṛśakāśca yasya udāra hīnāstatha madhyamāśca /
S04bsu036_u:5043: vicitrarūpāśca bhavanti yatra iha sthito ghrāṇabalena ghrāyati //
S04bsu036_u:5044: Saddhp_18.41 udyānabhūmiṃ ca tathā prajānate sudharma devāsani vaijayante /
S04bsu036_u:5045: prāsādaśreṣṭhe ca tathā vijānate ye co ramante tahi devaputrāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5046: iha sthito ghrāyati gandhu teṣāṃ gandhena so jānati devaputrān /
S04bsu036_u:5047: Saddhp_18.42 iha sthito ghrāyati gandhu teṣāṃ gandhena so jānati devaputrān /
S04bsu036_u:5049: yo yatra karmā kurute sthito vā śete vā gacchati yatra vāpi //
S04bsu036_u:5050: Saddhp_18.43 yā devakanyā bahupuṣpamaṇḍitā āmuktamālyābharaṇā alaṃkṛtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5051: ramanti gacchanti ca yatra yatra gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5052: Saddhp_18.44 yāvadbhavāgrādupariṃ ca devā brahmā mahābrahma vimānacāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5053: tāṃścāpi gandhena tahiṃ prajānate sthitāṃśca dhyāne atha vyutthitān vā //
S04bsu036_u:5054: Saddhp_18.45 ābhāsvarān jānati devaputrān cyutopapannāṃśca apūrvakāṃśca /
S04bsu036_u:5055: ghrāṇendriyaṃ īdṛśa tasya bhoti yo bodhisattvo imu sūtra dhārayet //
S04bsu036_u:5056: Saddhp_18.46 ya keci bhikṣū sugatasya śāsane abhiyuktarūpā sthita cakrameṣu /
S04bsu036_u:5057: uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca bhikṣavo sarvān hi so jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5058: Saddhp_18.47 ye śrāvakā bhonti jinasya putrā viharanti kecit sada vṛkṣamūle /
S04bsu036_u:5059: gandhena sarvān vidu jānate tān amutra bhikṣū amuko sthito ti //
S04bsu036_u:5060: Saddhp_18.48 ye bodhisattvāḥ smṛtimanta dhyāyino uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca ye sadā /
S04bsu036_u:5061: parṣāsu dharmaṃ ca prakāśayanti gandhena tān jānati bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5062: Saddhp_18.49 yasyāṃ diśāyāṃ sugato mahāmunirdharmaṃ prakāśeti hitānukampakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5063: puraskṛtaḥ śrāvakasaṃghamadhye gandhena so jānati lokanātham //
S04bsu036_u:5064: Saddhp_18.50 ye cāpi sattvā sya śṛṇoti dharmaṃ śrutvā ca ye prītamanā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:5065: iha sthito jānati bodhisattvo jinasya parṣāmapui tatra sarvām //
S04bsu036_u:5066: Saddhp_18.51 etādṛśaṃ ghrāṇabalaṃ sya bhoti na ca tāva divyaṃ bhavate sya ghrāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:5067: pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya tu eta bhoti divyasya ghrāṇasya anāsravasya //
S04bsu036_u:5068_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5069: sa tathārūpeṇa jihvendriyeṇa yān yān rasānāsvādayati,
S04bsu036_u:5072: tathā ca āsvādayiṣyati yathā na kaṃcid rasamamanaāpamāsvādayiṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5073: ye 'pi amanaāpā rasāste 'pi tasya jihvendriye samupanikṣiptāḥ divyaṃ rasaṃ mokṣyante /
S04bsu036_u:5075: tena tasya te sattvāḥ prīṇitendriyā bhaviṣyanti tuṣṭāḥ paramatuṣṭāḥ prāmodyajātāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5076: madhuraścāsya valgumanojñasvaro gambhīro niścariṣyati hṛdayaṃgamaḥ premaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5079: te cāsya madhuranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā valgumanojñaṃ devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravanāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5080: devaputrā api devakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5081: śakrā api brahmāṇo 'pi brahmakāyikā api devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5082: nāgā nāgakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5083: asurā asurakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5084: garūḍā garūḍakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5088: piśācāḥ piśācakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu036_u:5089: te cāsya satkāraṃ kariṣyanti, gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kariṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:5091: rājāno 'pi rājaputrā api rājāmātyā api rājamahāmātrā api darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:5093: cakravartino 'pi saptaratnasamanvāgatāḥ sakumārāḥ sāmātyāḥ sāntaḥpuraparivārā darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti
S04bsu036_u:5095: tāvanmadhuraṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyate yathābhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ tathāgatena /
S04bsu036_u:5096: anye 'pi brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo naigamajānapadāstasya dharmabhāṇakasya [Vaidya_219] satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti yāvadāyuṣparyavasānam /
S04bsu036_u:5100: yasyāṃ ca diśi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vihariṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5104: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5105: Saddhp_18.52 jihvendriyaṃ tasya viśiṣṭu bhoti na jātu hīnaṃ rasa svādayeta /
S04bsu036_u:5106: nikṣiptamātrāśca bhavanti divyā rasena divyena samanvitāśca //
S04bsu036_u:5107: Saddhp_18.53 valgusvarāṃ madhura prabhāṣate girāṃ śravaṇīyamiṣṭāṃ ca manoramāṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5108: parṣāya madhyasmi ha premaṇīyaṃ gambhīraghoṣaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate //
S04bsu036_u:5109: Saddhp_18.54 yaścāpi dharmaṃ śṛṇute 'sya bhāṣato dṛṣṭāntakoṭīnayutairanekaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5110: prāmodya tatrāpi janeti so 'graṃ pūjāṃ ca tasya kurute 'prameyām //
S04bsu036_u:5111: Saddhp_18.55 devā pi nāgāsuraguhyakāśca draṣṭuṃ tamicchanti ca nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:5112: śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ ca sagauravāśca ime guṇāstasya bhavanti sarve //
S04bsu036_u:5113: Saddhp_18.56 ākāṅkṣamāṇaśca ima lokadhātuṃ svareṇa sarvāmabhivijñapeyā /
S04bsu036_u:5114: snigdhaḥ svaro 'sya madhuraśca bhoti gambhīra valguśca supremaṇīyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5115: Saddhp_18.57 rājāna ye kṣitipati cakravartinaḥ pūjārthikāstasyupasaṃkramanti /
S04bsu036_u:5116: saputradārā kariyāṇa añjaliṃ śṛṇvanti dharmasya ca nityakālam //
S04bsu036_u:5117: Saddhp_18.58 yakṣāṇa co bhoti sadā puraskṛto nāgāna gandharvagaṇāna caiva /
S04bsu036_u:5118: piśācakānāṃ ca piśācikānāṃ susatkṛto mānitu pūjitaśca //
S04bsu036_u:5119: Saddhp_18.59 brahmāpi tasya vaśavarti bhoti maheśvaro īśvara devaputraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5121: Saddhp_18.60 buddhāśca ye lokahitānukampakāḥ saśrāvakāstasya niśāmya ghoṣam /
S04bsu036_u:5122: karonti rakṣāṃ mukhadarśanāya tuṣṭāśca bhonti bruvato 'sya dharmam //
S04bsu036_u:5123_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayamāṇo
S04bsu036_u:5123_1: vā vācayamāno vā prakāśayamāno vā deśayamāno vā likhamāno vā aṣṭau kāyaguṇaśatāni pratilapsyati /
S04bsu036_u:5124: tasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ pariśuddho vaiḍūryapariśuddhacchavivarṇo bhaviṣyati, priyadarśanaḥ sattvānām /
S04bsu036_u:5125: sa tasminnātmabhāve pariśuddhe sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5126: ye ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāścyavanti upapadyante ca,
S04bsu036_u:5130: ye ca cakravālamahācakravāleṣu merusumeruṣu ca parvatarājeṣu sattvāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5131: ye ca adhastādavīcyāmūrdhvaṃ ca yāvad bhavāgraṃ sattvāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5133: ye cāpi kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātrau śrāvakā vā pratyekabuddhā vā bodhisattvā vā tathāgatā vā prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5134: yaṃ ca te tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu036_u:5136: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāmātmabhāvapratilambhān sva ātmabhāve drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5138: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5139: Saddhp_18.61 pariśuddha tasyo bhavatetmabhāvo yathāpi vaiḍūryamayo viśuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5140: sattvāna nityaṃ priyadarśanaśca yaḥ sūtra dhāreti idaṃ udāram //
S04bsu036_u:5141: Saddhp_18.62 ādarśapṛṣṭhe yatha vimbu paśyet loko 'sya kāye ayu dṛśyate tathā /
S04bsu036_u:5143: svayaṃbhu so paśyati nānyi sattvāḥ pariśuddhi kāyasmi ima evarūpā //
S04bsu036_u:5144: Saddhp_18.63 ye lokadhātau hi ihāsti sattvā manuṣya devāsura guhyakā vā /
S04bsu036_u:5145: narakeṣu preteṣu tiraścayoniṣu pratibimbu saṃdṛśyati tatra kāye //
S04bsu036_u:5146: Saddhp_18.64 vimāna devāna bhavāgra yāvacchailaṃ pi co parvatacakravālam /
S04bsu036_u:5147: himavān sumeruśca mahāṃśca meruḥ kāyasmi dṛśyantimi sarvathaiva //
S04bsu036_u:5148: Saddhp_18.65 buddhān pi so paśyati ātmabhāve saśrāvakān buddhasutāṃstathānyān /
S04bsu036_u:5149: ye bodhisattvā viharanti caikakā gaṇe ca ye dharma prakāśayanti //
S04bsu036_u:5150: Saddhp_18.66 etādṛśī kāyaviśuddhi tasya yahi dṛśyate sarviya lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5151: na ca tāva so divya na prāpuṇoti prakṛtīya kāyasyiyamīdṛśī bhavet //
S04bsu036_u:5152_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgate parinirvṛte
S04bsu036_u:5152_1: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayato deśayataḥ saṃprakāśayato likhato vācayatastairdvādaśabhirmanaskāraguṇaśataiḥ
S04bsu036_u:5153: sa tena pariśuddhena manaindriyeṇa yadyekagāthāmapyantaśaḥ śroṣyati, tasya bahvarthamājñāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:5154: sa tāvamabudhya tannidānaṃ māsamapi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5156: yaṃ ca dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyati, so 'sya smṛto na sa saṃpramoṣaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:5157: ye kecillaukikā lokavyavahārā bhāṣyāṇi vā mantrā vā, sarvāṃstān dharmanayena saṃsyandayiṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5158: yāvantaśca kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsaranti,
S04bsu036_u:5161: apratilabdhe ca tāvadāryajñāne evaṃrūpaṃ cāsya manaindriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:5162: yāṃ yāṃ ca dharmaniruktimanuvicintya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, sarvaṃ tad bhūtaṃ deśayiṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5165: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5166: Saddhp_18.67 manaindriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti prabhāsvaraṃ śuddhamanāvilaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5167: so tena dharmān vividhān prajānati hīnānathotkṛṣṭa tathaiva madhyamān //
S04bsu036_u:5168: Saddhp_18.68 ekāmapi gātha śruṇitva dhīro artha bahuṃ jānati tasya tatra /
S04bsu036_u:5169: samitaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate māsān pi catvāri tathāpi varṣam //
S04bsu036_u:5170: Saddhp_18.69 ye cāpi sattvā iha lokadhātau abhyantare bāhiri ye vasanti /
S04bsu036_u:5171: devā manuṣyāsuraguhyakāśca nāgāśca ye cāpi tiraścayoniṣu //
S04bsu036_u:5172: Saddhp_18.70 ṣaṭsu gatīṣu nivasanti sattvā vicintitaṃ teṣa bhaveta yaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5173: ekakṣaṇe sarvi vidurvijānate dhāretva sūtraṃ ima ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5174: Saddhp_18.71 yaṃ cāpi buddhaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇo dharmaṃ prakāśedida sarvaloke /
S04bsu036_u:5175: tasyāpi śabdaṃ śṛṇute viśuddhaṃ yaṃ cāpi so bhāṣati gṛhyate tat //
S04bsu036_u:5176: Saddhp_18.72 bahūn vicinteti ca agradharmān bahūṃśca so bhāṣati nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:5177: na cāsya saṃmoha kadāci bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imi ānuśaṃsāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5178: Saddhp_18.73 saṃdhiṃ visaṃdhiṃ ca vijānate 'sau sarveṣu dharmeṣu vilakṣaṇāni /
S04bsu036_u:5179: prajānate artha niruktayaśca yathā ca taṃ jānati bhāṣate tathā //
S04bsu036_u:5180: Saddhp_18.74 yaṃ bhāṣitaṃ bhotiha dīrgharātraṃ pūrvehi lokācariyehi sūtram /
S04bsu036_u:5181: taṃ dharma so bhāṣati nityakālaṃ asaṃtrasanto pariṣāya madhye //
S04bsu036_u:5182: Saddhp_18.75 manaindriyaṃ īdṛśamasya bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imu vācayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:5183: na ca tāva asaṅgaṃ labhate ha jñānaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya imaṃ tu bhoti //
S04bsu036_u:5184: Saddhp_18.76 ācāryabhūmau hi sthitaśca bhoti sarveṣa sattvāna katheya dharmam /
S04bsu036_u:5185: niruktikoṭīkuśalaśca bhoti imu dhārayanto sugatasya sutram //
S04bsu036_u:5190_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāsthāmaprāptaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - anenāpi
S04bsu036_u:5190_1: tāvanmahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - yathā ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:5196: ye ca imamaevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:5198: teṣāmevamiṣṭo vipāko bhaviṣyati yādṛśo mayā pūrvaṃ parikīrtitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5200_1: pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena samayena bhīṣmagarjitasvararājo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu036_u:5200_2: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S04bsu036_u:5200_3: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vinirbhoge kalpe mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:5201_0: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavān bhīṣmagarjitasvararājastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5201_1: mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purato dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5202_0: yadidaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasamatikramāya
S04bsu036_u:5203: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya tathāgatajñānadarśanaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5204_0: tasya khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:5207_0: tasyāṃ khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya
S04bsu036_u:5207_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratirūpake ca antarhite
S04bsu036_u:5207_2: aparo 'pi bhīṣmagarjitasvararāja eva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
S04bsu036_u:5207_3: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
S04bsu036_u:5208: anayā mahāsthāmaprāpta paraṃparayā tasyāṃ mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhīṣmagarjitasvararājanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:5209: tatra mahāsthāmaprāpta yo 'sau tathāgataḥ sarvapūrvako 'bhūd bhīṣmagarjitasvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
S04bsu036_u:5210: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
S04bsu036_u:5211_0: tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya saddharme 'ntarhite saddharmapratirūpake ca antardhīyamāne
S04bsu036_u:5211_1: tasmin śāsane 'dhimānikabhikṣvadhyākrānte [Vaidya_225] sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo bhikṣurabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5212: kena kāraṇena mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāparibhūta ityucyate?
S04bsu036_u:5213: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yameva paśyati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣūṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:5214: taṃ tamupasaṃkramya eva vadati - nāhamāyuṣmanto yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
S04bsu036_u:5216: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarve hi bhavanto bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantu /
S04bsu036_u:5217: bhaviṣyatha yūyaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /
S04bsu036_u:5218: anena mahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhikṣubhūto noddeśaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:5221: sarvaṃ tamupaṃsakramya evaṃ saṃśrāvayati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:5222: taṃ tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadati - nāhaṃ bhaginyo yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
S04bsu036_u:5224: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvā yūyaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradhvam /
S04bsu036_u:5226: yaṃ yameva mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā evaṃ saṃśrāvayati,
S04bsu036_u:5229: paribhūtamātmānaṃ karoti yadasmākaṃ vyākarotyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asantamanākāṅkṣitaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5230: atha khalu mahāsthāmaprāpta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni varṣāṇi tathā ākruśyataḥ paribhāṣyamāṇasya gacchanti /
S04bsu036_u:5231: na ca kasyacit krudhyati, na vyāpādacittamutpādayati /
S04bsu036_u:5232: ye cāsya evaṃ saṃśrāvayato loṣṭaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā kṣipanti,
S04bsu036_u:5233: sa teṣāṃ dūrata eva uccaiḥsvaraṃ kṛtvā saṃśrāvayati sma - nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:5234: tasya tābhirabhimānikabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ satatasamitaṃ saṃśrāvyamāṇābhiḥ sadāparibhūta iti nāma kṛtamabhūt //
S04bsu036_u:5235_0: tena khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kālakriyāyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5235_1: pratyupasthitāyāṃ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5236: tena ca bhagavatā bhīṣmagarjitasvararājena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo viṃśatibhirgāthāviṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairbhāṣito 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5237: sa ca sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite antarīkṣanirghoṣādimaṃ dharmaparyāyamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu036_u:5238: yena kenacid bhāṣitamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān,
S04bsu036_u:5239: imāṃ caivaṃrūpāṃ cakṣurviśuddhiṃ śrotraviśuddhiṃ ghrāṇaviśuddhiṃ jihvāviśuddhiṃ kāyaviśuddhiṃ manoviśuddhiṃ ca pratilabdhavān /
S04bsu036_u:5240: sahapratilabdhābhirviśuddhibhiḥ punaranyāni viṃśativarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ātmano jīvitasaṃskāramadhiṣṭhāya imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:5242: ye pūrvaṃ nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti saṃśrāvitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5244: tasyodārarddhibalasthāmaṃ pratijñāpratibhānabalasthāmaṃ prajñābalasthāmaṃ [Vaidya_226] ca dṛṣṭvā sarve 'nusahāyībhūtā abhūvan dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu036_u:5245: sarve tena anyāni ca bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitānyabhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:5246: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataścyavitvā candrasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīśatānyārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5248_0: so 'nupūrveṇa tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyanupūrveṇa dundubhisvararājasahanāmnāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5251: so 'nenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyapūrveṇa meghasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatimeva tathāgatakoṭīśatasahasrāṇyārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5255: śrotrapariśuddhyā ghrāṇapariśuddhayā jihvāpariśuddhayā kāyapariśuddhayā manaḥpariśuddhayā samanvāgato 'bhūt //
S04bsu036_u:5256_0: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattva iyatāṃ tathāgata
S04bsu036_u:5256_1: koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:5256_2: anyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā,
S04bsu036_u:5257: sarveṣu ca teṣu imameva saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5258: ārāgayitvā sa tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena paripakvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5259: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5260: yastasya bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ sadāparibhūtaḥ saṃmato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5261: yena te tāvantastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitā abhūvan?
S04bsu036_u:5262: na khalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:5264: ahameva sa mahāsthāmaprāpta tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu036_u:5265: yadā mayā mahāsthāmaprāpta pūrvamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo nodgṛhīto 'bhaviṣyat,
S04bsu036_u:5268: yataścāhaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta paurvikāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikādimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāritavān vācitavān deśitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5270_0: yānyapi tāni mahāsthāmaprāpta tena sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhikṣuśatāni
S04bsu036_u:5270_1: bhikṣuṇīśatāni ca upāsakaśatāni upāsikāśatāni ca tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5276: daśa ca kalpasahasrāṇyavīcau mahānarake dāruṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5277: te ca sarve tasmāt karmāvaraṇāt parimuktāḥ /

S04bsu036_u:5572_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5573: ādīpya ca dvāsaptativarṣasahasrāṇi teṣāṃ tathāgatadhātustūpānāṃ pūjāmakarot /
S04bsu036_u:5574: pūjāṃ ca kurvatā tasyāḥ parṣado 'saṃkhyeyāni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vinītāni /
S04bsu036_u:5576: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5578_0: taṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamaṅgahīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā aśrumukhā rudantaḥ
S04bsu036_u:5578_1: krandantaḥ paridevamānāḥ parasparametadūcuḥ - ayaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo
S04bsu036_u:5580_0: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sa sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvastān
S04bsu036_u:5580_1: bodhisattvāṃstāṃśca mahāśrāvakāṃstāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa - mā yūyaṃ kulaputrā
S04bsu036_u:5582: eṣo 'haṃ kulaputrā ye keciddaśasu dikṣu anantāparyantāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S04bsu036_u:5583: tān sarvān buddhān bhagavataḥ sākṣiṇaḥ kṛtvā teṣāṃ purataḥ sattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ karomi,
S04bsu036_u:5584: yena satyena satyavacanena svaṃ mama bāhuṃ tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe parityajya suvarṇavarṇo me kāyo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5585: tena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ mama bāhuryathāpaurāṇo bhavatu,
S04bsu036_u:5588: atha khalu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña samanantarakṛte 'smin satyādhiṣṭhāne tena sarvasattvapriyadarśanena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena,
S04bsu036_u:5589: atha khalviyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā,
S04bsu036_u:5591: tasya ca sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sa bāhuryathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5592: yaduta tasyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya jñānabalādhānena puṇyabalādhānena ca /
S04bsu036_u:5593: syāt khalu punaste nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt?
S04bsu036_u:5594: na khalu punaste nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:5596: ayaṃ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5597: iyanti nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi karoti,
S04bsu036_u:5599_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimākāṅkṣamāṇo yaḥ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5600: ekāṃ hastāṅguliṃ pādāṅguliṃ vā ekāṅgaṃ vā bāhumādīpayet,
S04bsu036_u:5601: bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavati /
S04bsu036_u:5602: na tveva rājyaparityāgānna priyaputraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgānna trisāhasramahāsāhasrīlokadhātoḥ savanasamudraparvatotsasarastaḍāgakūpārāmāyāḥ parityāgāt /
S04bsu036_u:5603_1: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:5604: sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvat puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S04bsu036_u:5605: yāvat sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yaḥ itaḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkāddharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayet,
S04bsu036_u:5607: na tvevaṃ imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadatastasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5608: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāmutsasarastaḍāgānāṃ mahāsamudro mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5609: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5610: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ kālaparvatānāṃ cakravālānāṃ mahācakravālānāṃ ca sumeruḥ parvatarājo mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5611: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña [Vaidya_241] ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ rājā mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5612: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ candramāḥ prabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5613: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaścandrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrātirekaprabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5614: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvaṃ tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
S04bsu036_u:5615: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvākuśalatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
S04bsu036_u:5616: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5617: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmindraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5618: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ sarveṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ rājā brahmaloke pitṛkāryaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:5619_0: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5619_1: sattvānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5620: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvabālapṛthagjanānatikrāntaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaśca,
S04bsu036_u:5621: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān sūtrāntānatikramya abhyudgato mūrdhaprāpto veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5623: mūrdhaprāptā veditavyāḥ, ye khalvimaṃ sūtrarājaṃ dhārayiṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:5624: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvo 'gra ākhyāyate,
S04bsu036_u:5625: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sutrāntānāmagra ākhyāyate /
S04bsu036_u:5626: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ tathāgato dharmarājaḥ paṭṭabaddhaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5627: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastathāgatabhūto bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānām /
S04bsu036_u:5628: trātā khalvapi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvabhayebhyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5630_0: taḍāga iva tṛṣitānāmagniriva śītārtānāṃ cailamiva nagnānāṃ sārthavāha iva vaṇijānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5630_1: māteva putrāṇāṃ nauriva pāragāmināṃ vaidya iva āturāṇāṃ dīpa iva tamondhakārāvṛtānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5630_2: ratnamiva dhanārthināṃ cakravartīva sarvakoṭṭarājānāṃ samudra iva saritāmulkeva sarvatamondhakāravidhamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:5631: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocakaḥ sarvavyādhicchedakaḥ sarvasaṃsārabhayabandhanasaṃkaṭapramocakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5632: yena cāyaṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5635: eṣāṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña puṇyābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ bauddhena jñānena na śakyaṃ paryanto 'dhigantum,
S04bsu036_u:5636: yāvantaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5637_0: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā deśayitvā vā śrutvā vā likhitvā [Vaidya_242]
S04bsu036_u:5637_1: vā pustakagataṃ vā kṛtvā satkuryāt gurukuryānmānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākavaijayantībhirvādyavastrāñjalikarmabhirvā
S04bsu036_u:5637_4: pūjābhiḥ satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ kuryāt pūjanāṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:5639: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūvayogaparivartaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati śroṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5640: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña mātṛgrāma imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā udgahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5641_1: pañcāśatyāṃ śrutvā mātṛgrāmaḥ pratipatsyate sa khalvataścyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate
S04bsu036_u:5641_2: yasyāṃ sa bhagavānamitāyustathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:5642: sa tasyāṃ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa upapatsyate /
S04bsu036_u:5643: na ca tasya rāgo vyābādhiṣyate, na dveṣo na moho na māno na mātsaryaṃ na krodho na vyāpādaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5646: anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvāsaptatigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃstathāgatān drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5648: yena cakṣurindriyeṇa pariśuddhena tān buddhān bhagavato drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5649: te cāsya buddhā bhagavantaḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu036_u:5650_0: yattvayā saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:5650_1: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane uddiṣṭaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ bhāvitaṃ cintitaṃ manasi kṛtaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5651: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyamagninā dagdhuṃ nodakena hartum /
S04bsu036_u:5652: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyaṃ buddhasahesreṇāpi nirdeṣṭum /
S04bsu036_u:5655: na tava kulaputra sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadṛśo vidyate tathāgatamekaṃ vinirmucya /
S04bsu036_u:5656: nānyaḥ kaścicchrāvako vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā yastvāṃ śaktaḥ puṇyena vā prajñayā vā samādhinā vā abhibhavitum /
S04bsu036_u:5657: evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:5658: yaḥ kaścinnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvā sādhukāramanupradāsyati,
S04bsu036_u:5664: tasmāttarhi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña anuparindāmyahamimaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūrvayogaparivartam,
S04bsu036_u:5665: yathā paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasmin jambudvīpe pracaret,
S04bsu036_u:5669: na nāgā na yakṣā na gandharvā na kumbhāṇḍā avatāraṃ labheyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5672: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vyādhiḥ kāye na kramiṣyati, na jarā nākālamṛtyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5673: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paśyedevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣum,
S04bsu036_u:5675: abhyavakīrya caivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - gamiṣyatyayaṃ kulaputro bodhimaṇḍam /
S04bsu036_u:5682_1: vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam
S04bsu036_u:5683: asmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyapūrvayogaparivarte nirdiśyamāne caturaśītīnāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarutakauśalyānugatāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5684: sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña,
S04bsu036_u:5687: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma dvāviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5691: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇād bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt prabhāṃ pramumoca,
S04bsu036_u:5692: yayā prabhayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ābhayā sphuṭānyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:5693: tāni ca aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5694: tatra kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati vipulenāyuṣpramāṇena /
S04bsu036_u:5695: vipulena bodhisattvasaṃghena sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5696: atha khalu yā bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenorṇākośāt prabhā pramuktāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5697: sā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatyā ābhayā spharati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5698: tasyāṃ khalu punarvairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati sma avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5699: dṛṣṭapūrvāśca tena bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpā raśmyavabhāsāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5703: tasya khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sā prabhā kāye nipatitābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5704: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ
S04bsu036_u:5705_1: - gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5713_1: samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvayā kulaputra
S04bsu036_u:5714: sā khalu punaḥ kulaputra lokadhāturutkūlanikūlā [Vaidya_245] mṛnmayī kālaparvatākīrṇā gūthoḍillaparipūrṇā /
S04bsu036_u:5715: sa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho hrasvakāyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5722: tasmāttarhi kulaputra tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ gatvā mā hīnasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyasi tathāgate ca bodhisattveṣu ca tasmiṃśca buddhakṣetre //
S04bsu036_u:5725: gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena tathāgatabalādhānena tathāgatavikrīḍitena tathāgatavyūhena tathāgatābhyudgatajñānena /
S04bsu036_u:5726: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmanuccalita eva tasmād buddhakṣetrādanutthitaścaiva tasmādāsanāt tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
