S04bsu036_u:6132_2: tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ kanīyaso bhrātuḥ paṭṭaṃ baddhvā
S04bsu036_u:6134: tau ca dvau dārakau sārdhaṃ tairdvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6135_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6136: pravrajitvā ca rājā śubhavyūhaḥ saparivāraścaturaśītivarṣasahasrāṇyabhiyukto vijahāra imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan /
S04bsu036_u:6137: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhasteṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma /
S04bsu036_u:6138: sahapratilabdhāccāsya samādheḥ, atha tāvadeva saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgacchati sma //
S04bsu036_u:6139_0: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājāḥ śubhavyūho gaganatale sthitastaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ
S04bsu036_u:6139_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - imau bhagavan mama putrau śāstārau bhavataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6144: kalyāṇamitrau bhagavan mama tau dvau dārakau putrarūpeṇa mama gṛha upapannau,
S04bsu036_u:6146: evamukte bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat - evametanmahārāja,
S04bsu036_u:6148: avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ hi mahārāja kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarveṣu bhavagaticyutyupapattyāyataneṣūpapannānāṃ sulabhāni bhavanti kalyāṇamitrāṇi,
S04bsu036_u:6152: paśyasi tvaṃ mahārāja etau dvau dārakau? āha - paśyāmi bhagavan, paśyāmi sugata /
S04bsu036_u:6153: bhagavānāha - etau khalu punarmahārāja kulaputrau pañcaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānḥṃ tathḥgatḥnḥmarhatḥṃ samyaksaṃbuddhḥnḥmantike pūjḥṃ kariṣyataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6154: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ dhḥrayiṣyataḥ sattvḥnḥmanukampḥyai,
S04bsu036_u:6156_0: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastato gaganatalādavatīrya daśanakhamañjaliṃ
S04bsu036_u:6157: nirdiśatu tathāgataḥ - kīdṛśena jñānena samanvāgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena mūrdhni uṣṇīṣo vibhāti,
S04bsu036_u:6160: sā ca samasahitā dantāvalī vadanāntare virājati,
S04bsu036_u:6163_0: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rāja śubhavyūha iyadbhirguṇaistaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ
S04bsu036_u:6163_3: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvanmahārthamidaṃ tathāgataśāsanam,
S04bsu036_u:6166: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ bhagavanna bhūyaścittasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6169: na bhūyaḥ pāpakānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6170: ebhirahaṃ bhagavan iyadbhirakuśalaidharmaiḥ samanvāgato necchāmi bhagavato 'ntikamupasaṃkramitum /
S04bsu036_u:6171: sa tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrajasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya antarīkṣagata evāsthāt //
S04bsu036_u:6172: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe 'kṣaipsīt /
S04bsu036_u:6173: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6175: tasmiṃśca paryaṅke tathāgatavigrahaḥ paryaṅkabaddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu036_u:6176: atha khalu rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyaitadabhavat - mahānubhāvamidaṃ buddhajñānam,
S04bsu036_u:6178: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:6179_1: parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma - paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ
S04bsu036_u:6181: bhagavānāha - eṣa khalu bhikṣavaḥ śubhavyūho rājā mama śāsane bhikṣubhāvaṃ kṛtvā śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6182: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:6184: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6186: samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6188: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt?
S04bsu036_u:6189: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:6191: ayameva sa padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhut /
S04bsu036_u:6192: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma [Vaidya_263] rājabhāryābhūt?
S04bsu036_u:6193: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:6195: ayaṃ sa vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitadhvajarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhut /
S04bsu036_u:6196: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:6197: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakāvabhūtām?
S04bsu036_u:6198: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:6200: imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām /
S04bsu036_u:6201: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,
S04bsu036_u:6205: te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena //
S04bsu036_u:6206: asmin khalu punaḥ pūrvayogaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham //
S04bsu036_u:6207: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye śubhavyūharājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:6211_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ
S04bsu036_u:6211_1: sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prakampadbhiḥ kṣetrai pravarṣadbhiḥ padmaiḥ pravādyamānaistūryakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6212_0: mahatā bodhisattvānubhāvena mahatyā bodhisattvavikurvayā mahatyā bodhisattvaddharyā
S04bsu036_u:6212_1: mahata bodhisattvamāhātmyena mahatā bodhisattvasamāhitena mahatā bodhisattvatejasā jājvalyamānena,
S04bsu036_u:6215_1: puraskṛtaḥ evamacintyairṛddhiprātihāryaiḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ
S04bsu036_u:6216: sa yenagṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatarājaḥ yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu036_u:6217_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:6217_1: - ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bhagavato ratnatejobhyudgatarājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādihāgataḥ
S04bsu036_u:6217_2: iha bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo deśyata iti /
S04bsu036_u:6219: amūni ca bhagavannetāvanti bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāyāgatāni /
S04bsu036_u:6220: tatsādhu bhagavān deśayatu tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍārīkaṃ dharmaparyāyameṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vistareṇa /
S04bsu036_u:6221: evamukte bhagavān samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - uddhaṭitajñā hi kulaputra ete bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6222: api tvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo yaduta asaṃbhinnatathatā /
S04bsu036_u:6223: te bodhisattvā āhuḥ - evametad bhagavan, evametatsugata /
S04bsu036_u:6224: atha khalu yāstasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāśca saṃnipatitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6225_0: tāsāṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ punarapi bhagavān samantabhadraṃ
S04bsu036_u:6225_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya
S04bsu036_u:6225_2: mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6232: ebhiḥ kulaputra caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:6233_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:6233_1: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ
S04bsu036_u:6237: yathā na kaścitteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate /
S04bsu036_u:6238: na māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate,
S04bsu036_u:6239: na māraputrā na mārakāyikā devaputrā na mārakanyā na mārapārṣadyā yāvanna bhūyo māraparyutthito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6240: na devaputrā na yakṣā na pretā na pūtanā na kṛtyā na vetālāstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S04bsu036_u:6241: ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasya satatasamitaṃ nityakālaṃ rakṣāṃ [Vaidya_265] kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6242: yadā ca sa dharmabhāṇako 'smin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktaścaṃkramābhirūḍho bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6243_0: tadāhaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike śvetaṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya tasya
S04bsu036_u:6244: yadā punastasya dharmabhāṇakasya asmin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktasya sataḥ ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaḥ padavyañjanaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6245: tadāhaṃ tasmin śvetaṣaḍdante gajarāje 'bhiruhya tasya dharmabhāṇakasya saṃmukhamupadarśayitvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ pratyuccārayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6246_0: sa ca dharmabhāṇako mamātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā imaṃ ca dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ mamāntikācchrutvā
S04bsu036_u:6246_1: tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,
S04bsu036_u:6247: āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,
S04bsu036_u:6252_0: ye ca bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhikṣavo vā bhikṣūṇyo
S04bsu036_u:6252_1: vā upāsakā vā upāsikā vā evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakā evaṃ sūtrāntalekhakā evaṃ sūtrāntamārgakā
S04bsu036_u:6252_2: evaṃ sūtrāntavācakā ye paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāmasmin dharmaparyāye
S04bsu036_u:6254: tameva śvetaṃ ṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ ekaviṃśatime divase teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ caṃkramamāgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6255: āgatya ca tān dharmabhāṇakān parisaṃharṣayiṣyāmi samādāpayiṣyāmi samuttejayiṣyāmi saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6256: dhāraṇīṃ caiṣāṃ dāsyāmi, yathā te dharmabhāṇakā na kenaciddharṣaṇīyā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6257: na caiṣāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ lapsyante, na ca nāryo 'pasaṃhariaṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6258: rakṣāṃ caiṣāṃ kariṣyāmi, svastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmi, daṇḍaparihāraṃ kariṣyāmi, viṣadūṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6259: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan dharmabhāṇakānāmimāni dhāraṇīpadāni dāsyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6261_0: adaṇḍe daṇḍapati daṇḍāvartani daṇḍakuśale daṇḍasudhāri sudhārapati buddhapaśyane
S04bsu036_u:6261_1: sarvadhāraṇi āvartani saṃvartani saṃghaparīkṣite saṃghanirghātani dharmaparīkṣite
S04bsu036_u:6261_2: sarvasattvarutakauśalyānugate siṃhavikrīḍite anuvarte vartani vartāli svāhā //
S04bsu036_u:6262: imāni tāni bhagavan dhāraṇīpadāni yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrotrendriyasyāvabhāsamāgamiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6264: ayaṃ ca bhagavan saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracaramāṇo yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6265_0: tairbhagavan dharmabhāṇakairevaṃ veditavyam - samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānubhāvena
S04bsu036_u:6265_1: yadasmākamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastagataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā /
S04bsu036_u:6266: samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya [Vaidya_266] mahāsattvasya caryāyāste bhagavan sattvā lābhino bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6269: ye idaṃ sūtraṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti, mama tairbhagavan priyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6272: likhitvā ca te bhagavannidaṃ sūtramitaścyutvā trāyastriṃśatāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāya upapatsyante,
S04bsu036_u:6274: bherīmātreṇa mukuṭena te devaputrāstāsāmapsarasāṃ madhye sthāsyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6275: īdṛśaḥ kulaputrā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6276: kaḥ punarvādo ye etamuddekṣyanti svādhyāyiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti manasi kariṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6277: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ satkṛtya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo likhitavyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6286: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ paṇḍitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ satkṛtya likhitavyaḥ satkṛtyoddeṣṭavyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6289: imaṃ kulaputrā dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā uddiśya svādhyāyitvā bhāvayitvā manasikṛtvā evamaprameyā guṇā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6290: tasmāttarhi tena paṇḍitena bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6293: yathā bhagavan mamādhiṣṭhānena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracariṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:6294: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samantabhadrāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu samantabhadra,
S04bsu036_u:6295: yatra hi nāma tvamevaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya pratipannaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6299: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6301: ayaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikācchrutaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6304: anumoditaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhaviṣyati śākyamuninā ca tathāgatena teṣāṃ mūrdhni pāṇiḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6306: tathāgataśāsanaparigrāhakāśca te samantabhadra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro [Vaidya_267] vā veditavyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6309: na nṛttakā na mallā na nartakā na śauṇḍikaurabhrikakaukkuṭikasaukarikastrīpoṣakāḥ sattvāsteṣāmabhirucitā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6310: īdṛśāṃśca sūtrāntān śrutvā likhitvā dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā na teṣāmanyadabhirucitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6313: svapuṇyabalādhārāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti, priyadarśanāśca te bhaviṣyanti sattvānām /
S04bsu036_u:6316: na dveṣo na moho nerṣyā na mātsaryaṃ na mrakṣo na māno nādhimāno na mithyāmānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6318: yaḥ samantabhadra paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ paśyet,
S04bsu036_u:6326: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6332: ya evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ mohaṃ dāsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6335: teṣāṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme kāyaścitro bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6345: ye īdṛśānāṃ sūtrāntalekhakānāṃ sūtrāntavācakānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ ca sūtrāntadeśakānāṃ ca apriyāṃ vācaṃ bhūtāmabhūtāṃ vā saṃśrāvayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6347: tasmāttarhi samantabhadra asya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dūrata eva pratyutthātavyam /
S04bsu036_u:6349: tathā teṣāmeva sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāmevaṃ gauravaṃ kartavyam //
S04bsu036_u:6350: asmin khalu punaḥ samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarte nirdiśyamāne gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīśatasahasrāvartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt //
S04bsu036_u:6351: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarto nāma ṣaḍviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:6355_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utthāya tasmāddharmāsanāt
S04bsu036_u:6355_1: sarvāṃstān bodhisattvāan piṇḍīkṛtya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā ṛddhayabhisaṃskārapariniṣpannena
S04bsu036_u:6355_3: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6356: yathā vipulā vaistārikī bhavet, tathā yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāḥ karaṇīyam /
S04bsu036_u:6357_0: dvaitīyakamapi traitīyakamapi bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇināadhyālambyaitadavocat
S04bsu036_u:6357_2: yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipami /
S04bsu036_u:6358: yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputra udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā deśayitavyā prakāśayitavyā /
S04bsu036_u:6360: amātsaryo 'haṃ kulaputrā aparigṛhītacitto viśārado buddhajñānasya dātā,
S04bsu036_u:6364: amatsaribhirbhūtvemaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanaṃ mahopāyakauśalyamāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃśrāvayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6365: ye ca aśrāddhāḥ sattvāste 'smin dharmaparyāye samādāpayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6366: evaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāstathāgatānāṃ pratikāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:6367: evamuktāste bodhisattva mahāsattva bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena mahatā prītiprāmodyena sphutā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:6368_0: mahacca gauravamutpādya yena bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhana samyaksaṃbuddhastenāvanatakāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:6368_1: praṇatakāyāḥ saṃnatakāyāḥ śirāṃsyavanāmya añjaliṃ pragṛhya sarva ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa
S04bsu036_u:6368_2: bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ - tathā bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:6372: traitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa evaṃ bhāṣate sma - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu yathāsukhavihārī /
S04bsu036_u:6373: tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:6375: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānanyebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ samāgatān visarjayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:6376: yathāsukhavihāraṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmārocayati sma - yathāsukhaṃ tathāgatā viharantvarhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /
S04bsu036_u:6377: taṃ ca tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpaṃ yathābhūmau sthāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:6381: te cāprameyā asaṃkhyeyāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyalokadhātvāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6382: prabhutaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6383: te ca viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā bodhisattva mahāsattvā ye pṛthivīvivarebhyo 'bhyudgatāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6384: te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ tāśca catasraḥ parṣadaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6386: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye 'nuparīndanāparivarto nāma saptaviṃśatimaḥ samāptaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:6388: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu036_u:6389: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
